short_description: CO2 removal from air at industrial scale
description: We are building a machine to capture & remove CO2 from air at industrial scale to help companies & organizations hit their Net Zero targets.

short_description: SaaS Research and Procurement Platform
description:
CloudEagle helps IT & procurement teams save on software spend and help streamline the renewal and buying process. Our customers save 10-30% on their existing spend and hundreds of hours renewing and buying new apps. 

- Your single system of record for all things “SaaS Vendors”
    --> Contract renewal reminders & cost optimization alerts
    --> Cross-team workflows for renewing and buying apps
    --> Personalized vendor recommendations, better than G2 and Gartner

short_description: Enabling the next generation of alternative meats
description: Mooji Meats textures plant-based meat and cultured meat - think of turning ground meat into an authentic steak. We build a highly scalable 3D printing process that overcomes today's trade-off between authentic textures and scalability. We close the gap in taste, look, feel, nutrition, cost between meat mimics and real meat, tapping into an $1 trillion market opportunity.

short_description: Replace LLCs with DAOs in Emerging Markets
description:
We replace LLCs with DAOs for cross-border business and project collaborations. Instead of setting up your next project or company as a limited liability company, we enable you to set it up as a DAO supported by a legal infrastructure for "real-world" company interactions. 

For many projects in the informal economy or in jurisdictions with high registration costs and lengthy licensing times, or those with global collaborators, our DAOs help people take company setup from 90 days to 90s, getting them started on raising funds and building the future right away. We also provide a legal layer to enable high AUM DAOs to participate in global arbitration so their assets are better protected.

short_description: GoSats helps you earn free bitcoin when you shop in India.
description: GoSats is a bitcoin rewards app. We help people accumulate free bitcoin as cashbacks and rewards every time they shop in India.

short_description: The Last Mile delivery service for e-commerce businesses in Europe.
description:
We increase the retailers’ customer retention by offering a high quality same day and next day delivery with sustainable vehicles.
In the last three months, we have signed $1.4MM in annual contract value with customers like a global fashion retailer with $25B annual revenue.
On average, we charge retailers $3.5 per parcel. 
In Europe, 15B e-commerce parcels get delivered every year. This represents a market opportunity of $55B.
The founders Felix, Philip and Fabian met at university in 2016 and ran a profitable sneaker business together.
 🌱⚡️📦

short_description: Handshake for South East Asia
description: We help companies hire curated junior–mid level, fresh graduates, and students (1–3 YOE) 200X faster by promoting their career events and vacancies to our curated top early talent pool.

short_description: Underwater robotic vehicles that collect  battery metals responsibly
description:
Impossible mining is building underwater robotics vehicles which collect battery metals from the seabed without harming the environment. We have $500M+ in off-take LoI’s and have signed a partnership with a global offshore logistics company which holds a seabed mining exploration permit. We have also built the 1st PoC underwater robotic arm.

Polymetallic nodules are rocks which are rich in critical battery metals. Specially nickel, cobalt, manganese and copper. These metals are the the most expensive part of EVs.

short_description: Private MLS for off-market real estate
description: 1 in 5 homes sell off-market, where agents have a stranglehold on access to the inventory. Trusty brings transparency to the market by letting homeowners privately indicate their intent to sell, then present offers from matching qualified buyers.

short_description: Helping factories save power and CO2 via sensors
description:
Syncware helps factories detect faulty and idle machines by measuring the electric current that flows to each individual machine. This helps them save electricity, CO2 and thousands of dollars per month. 

For example, compressed air machines consume 2 times more energy when they have a small leak in them.

Data insights should lead to actions. Syncware makes it easy for companies to trigger actions by being interoperable with PLCs, robots, MES, and other sensors. 

By combining electric current data with temperature, vibration, or motion data we can know exactly when each machine is doing what - useful information for plant managers to further optimize their production lines.

short_description: Control All of Your Investments from a Single App
description:
TAI is an investing app that helps millennial investors trade and manage all their existing accounts from a single app. 

TAI uses algorithms and market themes to help users discover actionable insights on how to improve their portfolios using ETFs.

short_description: Subscription consumer electronics for Asia
description:
Circular is accelerating the adoption of the circular economy by making subscriptions the best way to access and experience tech: from smartphones, laptops, and headphones to gaming, VR and wearables.

Our customers get their hands on the best tech through low-cost, convenient subscriptions. They can pay monthly, keep it as long as they want, and if they love it, buy it. If they return it, we carefully refurbish it and pass it on to the next loving owner - radically extending its useful life.

short_description: Automating warehouse inventory checks, with a phone
description:
It’s our vision to make anything in a warehouse SEE and THINK. From people to drones, to robots and CCTV’s. We aim to enable them to track, handle, and verify any type of good, because doing that efficiently is what warehousing is all about. 

We’re taking the first step with our AI-based phone application that enables warehouse operators to automatically verify and count warehouse inventory. The operator simply needs to take pictures.

short_description: Sync data from data warehouses to business systems
description: HelloGuru makes it easy for non-technical teams to consolidate all customer data into existing business systems. We do this by providing a No-Code UI where users sync their data from data warehouses to business tools such as Salesforce, HubSpot, or Intercom.

short_description: We help underbanked workers get paid before payday
description: We are building a new financial platform that helps underbanked workers get paid as they earn it, anytime, anywhere. By partnering up with corporate employers, GIMO is providing a mobile financial application as a benefit to their employees, aiming at changing the way the employees earn, spend, save and invest.

short_description: Building aesthetic, minimalistic & software-defined Electric Vehicles
description:
Unique. Aesthetic. Minimalistic. Electric.

Olympian Motors is a new, disruptive automaker, building the most aesthetic, minimalistic, and software-defined Electric Vehicles.

•  Received 157 pre-orders for Olympian Model O1  ($15M+ pre-booked revenue)
•  Radically minimalistic cockpit and 'data-privacy-first' architecture powered by Olympian Operating System (OOS)
•  Rapid go-to-market: We have secured key partnerships to deliver the first Olympian O1 EVs  to customers by November 2022. (It took 9+ years for Lucid and 11+ years for Rivian to make their first commercial shipment).
•  Olympian has a unique fully 'fabless' production model in the U.S., running an asset-light operation with no CAPEX or no front R&D - unlike other conventional EV companies in the U.S.
•  We disrupt today’s commoditized car experience, elevate low quality/comfort standards, simplify over-complicated cockpit/UX, and create a new ‘experience-first’ consumer segment in the automotive.


We prioritize:
- Aesthetics over horsepower
- User experience over torque
- Classiness over top-speed
- Data privacy or data exchange
- Edge computing over cloud computing
- Minimalism over 30+ buttons and switches in the cockpit
- AR HUD over 2D Display screens
- Wood, steel and titanium materials over cheap plastic and veneer
- Sustainable & natural materials over toxic chemicals


We are creating the next big story in automotive.

short_description: Automated WireGuard networks for distributed systems and Kubernetes
description: Netmaker is an open source virtual networking platform based on WireGuard. With Netmaker, you can bridge, clouds, the edge, IoT devices, and Kubernetes clusters. Netmaker provides the fastest possible virtual networks, with an average speed 10x faster than standard alternatives. Think of Netmaker like your VPC for distributed systems.

short_description: Crypto wallet for web3 startups
description: Cashmere is a crypto wallet for web3 startups to manage their digital assets on Solana. Instead of running their business from one person’s wallet, startups can use our wallet to collaboratively manage their funds.

short_description: Simplifying loans with your friends & family.
description:
Pigeon Loans is a global lending platform that facilitates the creation and management of loans between friends, family, loved ones, and people who trust one another.

By offering a space where everyday people can negotiate and create loans, Pigeon Loans seeks to empower individuals to borrow and lend money with the people they trust.

short_description: Subscription entertainment news
description: The Ankler is subscription news for the entertainment industry so good that everyone from CEOs to creators pay to consume it every day.

short_description: Chatbot teaching K12 math in developing countries
description: Darsel is a AI-powered math education chatbot which is designed to supplement K12 education systems in resource-constrained environments. Darsel allows students to practice math questions & do their homework through platforms like SMS, WhatsApp and Facebook Messenger.

short_description: An API to bundle trackable, sustainable pledges with any transaction.
description:
Our mission is make sustainability profitable. 

Our API lets companies bundle sustainable pledges, such as tree planting, ocean-bound plastic cleanup, and coral planting, with any transaction. These pledges can be tracked on unique dashboards by the company's end-customers, and are carried out by world-leading NGOs.

With our tracking dashboards, companies are able to boost their post-purchase engagement 10x compared to email marketing, increase repurchasing rates, and boost social media shares.

short_description: The visual note-taking tool for learning complex topics.
description:
Heptabase is a visual note-taking tool that helps you learn complex topics. Think about when Notion and Figma have a baby — you can put your notes on whiteboards to record your thinking process. When you search for a note in the future, you can find the whiteboards it appears on to remember how you think with perfect visual memory.

Heptabase is backed by Y Combinator, HOF Capital, Kleiner Perkins, Moving Capital, Tonic Fund, and other investors, including the founders of Socialcam, Triplebyte, Codementor, and more.

short_description: Addressing Loneliness and Isolation for Seniors
description:
Navigating chronic illness is an isolating and lonely process which ultimately reduces medical adherence and adversely impacts outcomes. There are over 100 deadly chronic conditions as 1 out of 2 Americans is currently living with at least 1 chronic condition. The US healthcare system has over $1 trillion dollars in direct costs. Medical adherence rates for therapeutic programs and medicine are only 50% because patients feel lonely, isolated, and unsupported in their chronic illness journey.

Reviving Mind is an in-network telehealth provider that improves clinical outcomes and program adherence for the senior medicare and medicare-advantage population that is plagued with loneliness and chronic illness. This is done through a novel and proprietary clinical program and technology platform that integrates virtual, private, curated, and professionally led groups that scale up to 8-patients with individualized and goal oriented lifestyle medicine coaching that is automated but managed by a licensed provider.

Scaling rapidly across the United States.

short_description: Umbilical cord blood banking made easy
description: Helping pregnant parents capture stem cells from their umbilical cord for future disease treatment purposes

short_description: Making mental health accessible to everyone.
description:
We provide free digital mental health technologies for millions of people struggling online — particularly young people. 

For example, we partner with online communities to help find and treat at-risk individuals directly on their platform using our online interventions.

short_description: GoPuff  for Korea
description: '10 minute squad' delivers groceries/alcohols in 10 minutes in Korea.

short_description: Personal finance platform for Indonesia
description: We allow our users to create a single view of their finances from 22 banks, investment platforms and e-wallets to help them get control of their finances. We offer the most comprehensive account integrations and personal finance tools in Indonesia.

short_description: Climate change insurance that pays out immediately.
description:
The insurance industry struggles to insure new risks like climate change. The amount of climate risk that goes uninsured every year is $180 billion and growing. 

Plover's software platform enables insurers to design new insurance products quicker and manage policies cheaper, unlocking new risk markets and geographies.

Plover's team previously worked together at Palantir, handling data infrastructure for the US Department of Defense.

short_description: We teach UX/UI design and then help people get great jobs.
description: Avocademy was born from a need for more diverse designers. Current design programs are expensive and not accessible. We make it accessible for anyone to break into the field and change careers. Our students are 75% women, 65% BIPOC, & 33% LGBTQ+.

short_description: Mahaana is first & only licensed digital wealth manager in Pakistan
description: Pakistan has 401K style schemes for retirement but only 0.02% people have retirement accounts. Previously unallowed, Digital onboarding & KYC was adopted by the regulator in late 2021. We are the first & only licensed digital investment advisor and looking to take advantage of this regulatory tailwind. We are now licensed to create our own retirement funds & ETFs just like Vanguard

short_description: Marft creates embeddable machine learning models for application…
description: Marft creates embeddable machine learning models for application developers. Users submit data by web/API, and receive optimized models implemented in a language of their choice.

short_description: Search for blockchains
description: Chaingrep is a search engine for on-chain interactions and digital assets. You can think of it as a new kind of block explorer. We think that current block explorers like Etherscan are too complicated to use for regular users, and that abstracting a lot of their functionalities and filtering out all the noise can dramatically improve the experience of finding on-chain information.

short_description: We provide live after-school tutoring to K-12 students in Vietnam
description:
Marathon Education provides live interactive tutoring classes to K-12 students in Vietnam, we're the fastest-growing edtech player disrupting the $5bn offline tutoring market by allowing students to learn online with the best teachers in large-class or small-class format.

The company is founded by Duc, former education private equity investor at TPG Capital - where Duc invested in K-12 education and edtech businesses in Vietnam & Southeast Asia. Duc co-founded Marathon with Tung - serial tech entrepreneur in Vietnam who grew his last startup - Christina's to 500 employees across 8 cities.

short_description: Document and automate your internal business processes
description:
Workflow86 is an all-in-one platform for documenting, automating and scaling your team’s internal business processes and workflows. 

You use drag and drop components to document and build out your process step by step with modules like forms, business logic, document templates and more. It's no-code, so non-technical team members (bizops, HR, admin, legal, risk and compliance) can set up playbooks and processes on their own.

With Workflow86, teams are able to document and codify their workflows in one central place, massively scale their operational capacity without additional hires, and consolidate fragmented processes into one platform. 

Start building for free at app.workflow86.com

short_description: Unlocking solar for rental properties
description: Moneytree is an end-to-end platform that makes adding solar (+ battery storage) to a rental property as easy as adding coin laundry. With Moneytree, rental property owners earn guaranteed monthly returns on solar without taking on any new headaches or maintenance, while their renters get access to cheaper, cleaner renewable energy. A rental property owner with ten units can increase net operating income by $10,000+ per year, while saving each renter $100 or more on their energy bills.

short_description: The first sneaker marketplace built for power resellers
description: WANTD is the first sneaker marketplace built specifically for power resellers, who hold 80% of the secondary sneaker market supply. These power sellers are looking for ways to bulk manage their inventory while preserving their brand identity online, helping them move inventory quickly and efficiently. WANTD provides a platform for live video auctions, virtual storefronts, and bulk listing tools so that these resellers can move inventory in minutes, not weeks, and earn profits 45% higher than existing marketplaces. We launched our marketplace and one-click listing service for power sellers 4 weeks ago and have already done more than $100K GMV, growing 85% MoM. WANTD is backed by Slow Ventures, Hedgebay, and Y-Combinator (W22).

short_description: Creating digital communities for companies
description:
At Humand we help companies digitize their internal communication, culture, and HR within one friendly app.

Humand centralizes and allows:
+ Internal social network 📲
+ Forms 📄
+ Surveys 📝
+ Files 🗂️
+ Digital magazine 📰
+ Recognitions 🤩
+ Training 📚
+ Complete profiles 📲
+ Chat ⌨️
+ Tickets and inquiries ❗❓
+ Payslips 💵
+ Onboarding 📆
+ Benefits 😀

More than 50 companies use Humand. Implemented by ArcelorMittal (biggest steel producer in the world), Tenaris (global leader in steel pipes production), NSG group (among the biggest glass producers in the world), and many other organizations across different countries.

We enable all workers, especially those who do not work at a desk with direct access to a computer, to be connected with your company. Humand helps to improve internal communication speed, the flow of information between collaborators, and allows to have instant and targeted reach to all employees with push notifications.

It generates a digital community of your company that improves the working environment, where employees have a greater sense of belonging, are truly connected and collaborate.

short_description: In-the-moment user feedback for mobile and web apps to unlock growth.
description: 1Flow is building a user engagement layer for all apps on mobile and web to help companies increase conversion and reduce churn at scale – starting with in-product user feedback collection. Our first product is a flexible tech platform to collect in-product user feedback, that directly feeds into product development so you can know why churn and conversion happen, and launch features that will have a direct ROI to a company’s bottom line.

short_description: Enterprise software for companies to track & reduce their carbon…
description: Unravel Carbon is  an enterprise software that helps companies track and reduce their carbon emissions, focusing on Asia, based in Singapore. It is the first AI-powered decarbonization platform in Asia that converts any company’s accounting data into full supply chain carbon data in seconds, generates climate solutions automatically and auto-populates regulatory disclosure reports. PropertyGuru, a Unicorn in Asia, is already using us to achieve their climate goals.

short_description: Telehealth and at-home diagnostics for Long COVID
description:
RTHM provides virtual-first care for complex illness, starting with Long COVID.  Most Long COVID clinics focus on teaching patients how to better cope with symptoms, which is helpful, but we don’t stop there.  We develop collaborations & partnerships so our patients access to the most promising root-cause directed early therapies for Long COVID.

In conjunction with clinical care, RTHM operates a clinical lab and collects deep molecular data to develop AI-powered diagnostics and better ways of predicting which treatments may work best for whom.

We are starting to see patients in CA, OR, WA the last week of March 2022 & will be expanding to additional states quickly (NY, AZ, and more)!  Sign up at rthm.com.

short_description: User Research CRM
description: Rally is a User Research CRM that makes it easy for teams to do research with their users. By automating outreach, scheduling, incentives, and participant management, Rally replaces messy spreadsheets and disjointed tooling, saving teams hours each week.

short_description: The hottest new social media and music app
description:
Discz is where Gen Z comes to discover and share music. We’ve topped the Appstore charts globally and have over 1 million songs being discovered and saved to personal playlists every week. We also have a 4.9 rating in the iOS app store with over 20K reviews globally.

This is just the start of what we have planned.

short_description: A better financial platform for commercial real estate
description:
Arpari is financial platform for commercial real estate owners. We enable CRE owners to easily manage their day-to-day banking needs, collect rent, and manage their properties. 

Our platform improves the CRE banking workflow in the areas that matter most, including portfolio management, seamless account opening, and property management integrations.

short_description: A B2B marketplace for wholesale second hand fashion
description: Fleek is a B2B Wholesale Marketplace for second-hand fashion. Our buyers are vintage stores and online resellers; our suppliers are used clothing wholesalers, rag-houses, and donation centres.

short_description: Marketplace for private chefs
description:
Yhangry is a private chef marketplace, where you can book a chef whenever you want to socialise at home.

For $40pp, you can book a 3-course feast in just a few clicks. On the supply side, we help chefs earn 3 times as much as working in a restaurant.

short_description: One-stop-shop for Real Estate Solutions.
description: GoJom is a One Stop Shop for Real Estate Solutions. It’s technology creates a  faster and easier way to buy, sell and rent properties in LaTam.

short_description: Heroku for Data Science.
description: We are building a cloud platform to help data scientists develop and deploy projects without a dedicated engineering team to support them.

short_description: Uber for Nurses
description: Float brings a nurse to your home when you’re sick. If you have a chronic illness - migraines/gout/immune problems/MS/heart condition - instead of making you come to an overcrowded hospital full of sick people, we bring the best of the hospital to you.

short_description: We enable Latin American corner-stores procure inventory easily
description: Corner-stores can order their inventory (milk, sugar, beer, soups etc.) on an app and have it delivered to their store the very next day. They can also get access to credit to finance the inventory purchases. This is a 100B+ market in LatAm. We are starting in Mexico City but we will be a LatAm wide company over time.

short_description: Checkout widget to sell NFTs via credit card
description:
Winter offers an embeddable widget to help your consumers buy an NFT with a credit card or bank account! We also help custody & manage a user's NFT if they don't have a wallet.

We help crypto newbies take their first steps into web3 & NFTs!

Interested in partnering? Email us at sales@usewinter.com

short_description: APIs for ranking
about_founders: [{'name': 'Tullie Murrell, CEO', 'role': 'CEO', 'social_media_links': ['https://twitter.com/tulliemurrell', 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/tullie/']}, {'name': 'Tullie Murrell, CEO', 'role': 'CEO', 'social_media_links': ['https://twitter.com/tulliemurrell', 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/tullie/']}, {'name': 'Tullie Murrell, CEO', 'role': 'CEO', 'social_media_links': ['https://twitter.com/tulliemurrell', 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/tullie/']}]
description:
Shaped helps software companies increase engagement for feeds, recommendations and notifications using machine-learning. By providing an easy-to-use API, Shaped enables any engineer, even without ranking experience, to build machine-learning into their product. The best thing about Shaped is that it understands unstructured data, allowing businesses to get started no matter how their data is organized.

The team behind Shaped built the ranking models that power Facebook.

short_description: Modern parcel delivery for online sellers in Pakistan.
description: Rider is building modern parcel delivery for online sellers in Pakistan. We are doing $130K in monthly revenue, delivering 200K orders per month across 60 cities. Unlike traditional logistics players, Rider’s solution is: Easier to use (integration with shipper portals, delivery agent app, end- customer app); Quicker (route optimization, next day deliveries, 24-hour cash repayment); Transparent (resolves ‘fake attempt’ deliveries, offers live tracking) and Flexible (shipper and customer control on delivery location and times).

short_description: Low-code SaaS for marketing in push notifications
description:
AI-driven push marketing tool for mobile apps, that can be integrated in hours, without any code writing.

nGrow connects to behavioral data from analytical systems like Amplitude, Google Firebase, Mixpanel etc. and allows to setup auto push campaigns with an hours.

It's as simple as running  Google or Facebook but in push notifications channel. 
nGrow.ai customers usually got their up to 30% incremental Revenue lift.

We got Amplitude COO and ex-Google advisors on board

short_description: Paid text message communities for creators.
description:
Winno lets creators make money by charging subscriptions for text messages. A food influencer can send restaurant tips to paying subscribers, a sports blogger can share game day updates with top fans, and a podcaster can connect with their biggest supporters off-mic.

Email is for writers, SMS is for everyone. Texts are intimate, easy to write, and have a 4x higher open rate and 8x higher click-through rate than email, letting creators connect directly with top fans outside of noisy channels like social media and email inboxes.

short_description: All-in-one project management software for construction SMBs in Latam
full_location: São Paulo, State of São Paulo, Brazil
description:
Vobi is a project management platform for small construction businesses, like home remodeling companies, contractors, architects, and interior designers.

We help them save up to 50% of their time spent on manual work, mainly on the procurement and estimation processes, so they have more time to focus on their core activities. Through Vobi, they can manage projects from start to finish, collaborate with their customers, plan, quote, and make purchases or payments to suppliers, all in one place. No more spreadsheets and papers!

short_description: Online insurer with affordable insurance for low risk drivers in Latam
description:
We offer up to 40% lower premium by focusing on the population which are either low mileage drivers or have good driving habits, representing a $7B market.
Insurance penetration in LatAm is extremely low (30% for cars & 10% for motorcycles). This is because there is not an appropriate product for most vehicles (price, payment options, and distribution channels, etc.). We developed the tech to identify and offer affordable insurance for any vehicle (cars, motorcycles, bikes, scooters) based on mileage and driving habits. Then we added gamification, payment options for the unbanked population, and more.

short_description: The Super App for Venezuela
description:
QUIK is the Super App for Venezuela, letting customers order food, groceries and goods and get them in 30 minutes, while  providing users and businesses with a stable coin wallet they can use to pay, save money, and avoid currency risks.

Users can use QUIK Super App not only to buy goods directly and have them delivery by QUIK logistics team, but also to pay in the business by scanning a QR code. They can also transfer money between themselves, pay their services, all from one single App.

short_description: Student loan contributions as an employee benefit
description: Unsaddl enables employers to offer student loan contributions as an employee benefit. It helps with recruitment and retention and is tax-deductible for both employee and employer.

short_description: Matchmaking app for internet friends
description: WishRoll is a matchmaking app for internet friends. As young people now seek out online friends more than ever before, we make finding friends easy by connecting users to the people most compatible for real friendship.

short_description: D2C Skincare for Eczema
description:
Soteri Skin is D2C skincare for chronic skin conditions like eczema. We’re the only non-prescription product proven to provide long-lasting relief for the 30 million Americans who suffer from eczema.

How it works:
Skin surface pH is constantly in flux, and many of your daily activities can throw it out of balance. People with chronic skin conditions such as eczema have a harder time regulating their skin's pH. 

Soteri's patented pH/LOCK™ locks skin in at a therapeutic pH for 12+ hours, which is shown to help break the cycle of skin sensitivity, whether you have eczema, psoriasis, or just a bad sunburn.

Our formulations are aesthetically elegant (non-sticky, sit well under makeup, etc), safe for anyone to use, and don't require a prescription. Most people see skin health improvements within the first few weeks of application, even for tricky, chronic skin conditions like eczema and psoriasis.

With Soteri Skin, anyone can enjoy healthy, glowing, pH-enomenal skin!

short_description: Enabling fans to invest in artists & share in their success.
description: Decent enables musicians to monetize their work directly through their fans, aligning artist & fan incentives to reinvent funding, IP protection, and discovery.  We do this through a marketplace and infrastructure that enables musicians to issue NFTs collateralized by their royalties.

short_description: Run compute-intensive apps in a browser
description:
We are a platform for high-performance browser-based applications. We make it easier for developers to deploy apps that give every user a dedicated backend.

This is a system design that apps like Figma and GitHub codespaces use, but it's currently difficult for others to replicate it. We make it as easy as deploying a traditional web server.

short_description: Universal financial transaction data enrichment
description: Spade is a universal transaction enrichment API. With a single API call we take raw transaction data and add normalized merchant identities, categories, granular geo data, and more. We allow fintech companies to underwrite, identify fraud, understand their customers, and build faster than ever before.

short_description: Customer support tool purpose-built for companies that sell APIs
description:
Fogbender helps B2B companies support customer teams: think Intercom meets Slack's shared channels.

Today, all customer software is explicitly or implicitly designed for helping individuals, not teams. This is forcing B2B companies - who sell products to teams, not individuals - to augment their default customer support platform (Zendesk, Intercom, Front, etc) with a second, "unofficial", system: Slack's shared channels.

This causes a number of operational and logistical difficulties for both vendors and their customers, resulting in added costs, inefficiencies, and lost opportunities.

With Fogbender, B2B vendors embed a team-to-team messaging widget directly on their customer dashboard, where all users belonging to an account can - with no additional authentication - 1) see a list of currently-open issues 2) participate in conversations with their own team and the vendor, and 3) search all historical discussions.

short_description: Team-based authentication for B2B SaaS
description:
PropelAuth provides end-to-end managed user authentication and lets your users manage their own accounts and teams.

We have a focus on B2B features that make it easy for an end user to sign up, create and manage their own organization in your product, invite their co-workers, and so on. This includes roles within the organization (RBAC). 

We provide frontend and backend libraries where organizations are a first class concept, and we handle everything you need for authentication.

short_description: A verifiable computing platform
description: Yatima is a Substrate blockchain which uses on-chain formal verification and zero-knowledge proofs to radically improve the safety and scalability of smart contracts, and other deterministic computations.

short_description: Earn high and stable interest from DeFi lending markets
description:
Stablegains makes earning with DeFi simple and safe for consumers and businesses alike.

By developing the right products, we can bring the best and safest opportunities from the weird and wonderful world of crypto to regular people. 

We’ve already built a simple personal savings tool (see stablegains.com) powered by a DeFi lending protocol. 

In the next several years, we'll be expanding fast across new states and new countries. We'll integrate with a number of DeFi protocols, while at the same time making our product easier to use, safer and faster.

Our objective is to become recognized globally as the simplest, safest and most trusted place to access the benefits of DeFi, and to help millions of people achieve their financial goals.

short_description: Flexport for African Merchants
description:
Topship is the easiest way for African businesses to export/import cargo freight and parcels to their suppliers, distributors and customers.  We are building Flexport for Africa.

Our goal is to build a Global Distribution System that makes delivery of parcels, cargo and freight easy for African businesses.

short_description: Investing app for Muslims
description:
Amal's an investing app for Muslims. Muslims only invest in Shariah-compliant business, but it's hard to know which businesses are compliant. That's because it's based on complex financial metrics that change over time. We take that burden away entirely.

Amal can filter stocks but also, remarkably, funds. Set your filters up once, and you'll have access to a universe of investments that cater to your specific requirements.

short_description: B2B Payments in "One Click"
description: Snab aims to automate, digitize & simplify business payments & cash collections, as well as the treasury management of your business, all from one place, and in a safe manner.

short_description: Quan is an end-to-end platform to improve wellbeing and team…
description:
We provide a self-assessment which identifies the underlying causes of poor wellbeing and match proven solutions for individuals and teams.

https://www.quanwellbeing.com/

short_description: Faire for Convenience Stores
description:
Attain is a one-stop shop for convenience store owners to buy inventory across all their suppliers with higher reliability, price transparency, and product discovery.

On average, store owners buy products from over 10-15 different suppliers each week. This painful process involves shopping in massive warehouses or spending hours working with wholesaler’s sales representatives (who sometimes don’t even show up). As a result, stores waste countless hours ordering products through extremely inefficient and tedious processes. These store owners are also severely impacted by inventory shortages and revenue loss which many times results in them downsizing their business or shutting them down completely.

Attain solves this problem by providing a single app to purchase products across all of their suppliers, resulting in a one-stop shop for inventory. By aggregating inventory across a multitude of suppliers and wholesalers, Attain helps stores save significant time and money while allowing them to focus on what they do best - growing their businesses.

Feel free to reach out at founders@joinattain.com!

short_description: Prediction market of India
description:
Better Opinions is a prediction market of India which allows users to trade their opinion on everyday topics. For example, If you think India Covid cases will decrease by 10% this week, you can trade this insight and win money if correct.

Our aim is to make the app inclusive for all. The stock market unfortunately can be very technical and opaque and therefore isn’t always accessible for all. However, when we start allowing trading in categories such as cricket, politics and entertainment, not only do we make trading more relatable, but we also help improve their financial literacy.

short_description: Digital property manager and neobank for homeowner associations.
description: Forest (https://tryforest.com) is a full-service property manager for homeowners associations. We manage the community, provide neo-banking, maintain buildings, and help homeowners with their everyday needs.

short_description: The neobank designed for landlords
description: Nophin is the financial platform for modern landlords. Landlords use Nophin's banking and financial services to save time, increase property returns, and collect rent on time.

short_description: Fun and interactive All Hands & AMAs for remote teams
description:
Venue makes large remote meetings more fun and interactive. Companies like Shopify use Venue every day for Town Halls, Kickoffs, AMAs, and more.

We’re building Venue to be a place where teams can:

- Reflect their unique personality and culture.
- Create a vibe that’s fun, energizing, authentic and spontaneous.
- Provide a safe and inclusive space for colleagues to interact how they want to.

As a result, we’re seeing higher meeting attendance, better in-meeting engagement and remote team members that feel more energized and connected post meeting!

We'd love for you to try Venue at your next team-wide meeting. Let us know how we can help!

short_description: A VR headset designed to make virtual presence lifelike.
description:
The first killer use case for VR will be virtual presence—not gaming. The world is going remote, but our ability to feel connected with each other is limited to our screens. Work, friends, and social lives are globalizing.
So we built a VR headset and virtual world made for human expression and connection. And it leapfrogs the industry.

short_description: Cloud Software Making Industrial Machines Smart
description:
We’re a cloud software that connects industrial machines to the cloud to improve manufacturing efficiency.
We have $170k in Annual Recurring Revenue from Stanley Black & Decker, U.S. Air Force, and Schlumberger.
They use us to get real-time visibility into their machines and operations. Previously, they either had no data or they had to rely on bad information from their operators, which could take weeks to get.
Founders have MSc & PhD from Georgia Tech focusing on real-time machine learning and built software for Delta Airlines and Caterpillar.
We have a $46B TAM, from over 1.3M qualified factories in the US & EU, with an average subscription of $36k/year/factory.

short_description: Making homeownership possible.
description: Trueplace invests with first-time homebuyers to purchase their dream home. We provide a portion of the down payment in exchange for a share of the future capital appreciation of the home.

short_description: The Universal API for CRMs
description:
Vessel is the universal API for CRMs. We make it easy for companies to integrate with their customers' CRMs. Our vision is to become Plaid for the GTM stack.

Over 91% of companies with 10+ employees use a CRM as the system of record for their customers. Many products want to access this data, but the fragmented CRM market and engineering costs make it an expensive endeavor. 

Integrate with Vessel and never worry about building CRM integrations again. Our unified interface handles the nuances of reading and writing data across different CRMs.

short_description: Multi-Chain Crypto Wallet with a Crypto Debit Card
about_founders: [{'name': 'Dheeban Srinivasan Govindarajan', 'role': '', 'social_media_links': ['https://twitter.com/sgd88', 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/dheeban-s-g-a1a68634/']}, {'name': 'Dheeban Srinivasan Govindarajan', 'role': '', 'social_media_links': ['https://twitter.com/sgd88', 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/dheeban-s-g-a1a68634/']}, {'name': 'Dheeban Srinivasan Govindarajan', 'role': '', 'social_media_links': ['https://twitter.com/sgd88', 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/dheeban-s-g-a1a68634/']}]
description: Crypto Wallets are currently too geeky for mainstream users. We are building CypherD Wallet to solve this and take the web3 browsing experience to mainstream users. We launched our beta app last month and the current wallet works for EVM chains and also has one of the world's first non-custodial crypto cards as an add-on. We also have built the world's cheapest EVM cross-chain bridge.

short_description: The to-do app for kids with ADHD
description: Joon is a subscription app for parents with ADHD kids that uses gamification to help their kids become more responsible and independent. It’s a video game, but kids only level up if they do productive activities in real-life (like chores, exercising, homework, and hundreds of others).

short_description: Rich, complete data without internal tools
description: Bracket is the data pipeline between popular business tools and backend databases. When ops teams update data in Google Sheets or Airtable, and engineers update data in the database, Bracket connects the two sources to reflect the same information.

short_description: Lingt provided a web-based platform for learning languages leveraging…
description: Lingt empowers teachers to speak more with their students. Create and manage online speaking assignments for use in the classroom.

short_description: OurEye.ai automatically analyses security cameras with Computer Vision
description: OurEye.ai lets any business with CCTV Cameras use computer vision to analyze their camera feeds automatically. For example, one of our customers is a retail outlet that uses OurEye.ai to monitor footfall and store cleanliness.

short_description: WealthFront of Indonesia
description:
At PINA, we are designing and building the future of personal finance with a mission to help everyone achieve financial freedom by providing products and advice that make complicated financial decisions simple and relevant. 

We seamlessly integrate money management and investing into one app to allow people to manage their finances holistically. Users can see their net worth, monthly cash flow and how their budget has changed over the past several months. All of this is automated and designed to help them achieve the savings goal which they have set .

In addition to money management, we focus on making investing easy with pre-built portfolios and automatic rebalancing. When you sign up for an account, it offers the option to pick an expertly built portfolio, or you can choose to build your own.

short_description: Working capital for African micro businesses
description: Numida provides working capital loans to African micro businesses. Instead of borrowing from informal lenders or family, micro business owners download the Numida app, apply in minutes, and receive capital within a day. We have figured out how to score and disburse unsecured loans to cash-based businesses that have no digital transaction history, while maintaining excellent collection rates. In the past 9 months we have provided $8M in working capital to 15,000 businesses in East Africa.

short_description: Visually design and manage cloud infrastructures.
description:
Brainboard is a collaborative solution for engineers to visually design & operate their Cloud infrastructures.
We help our customers to increase the build and delivery of their infrastructures x11 and speed up their onboarding by up to 70%.

Both technical profiles with 20+ years of combined expertise and after working together at a major French Cloud provider, Chafik and Jeremy launched Brainboard in 2019.

short_description: official secondhand marketplaces for fashion brands
description:
re-mint lets fashion brands set up official secondhand marketplaces so their customers can buy and sell directly with each other.

We help brands monetize their resale market. We offer revenue share on transaction fees and use the transaction data to drive new sales. For example, if an Everlane customer sells her jeans because they are too small, we retarget her to purchase the larger size from Everlane's main e-commerce website.

short_description: Frictionless and powerful cloud dev environments
description: We deliver pre-configured cloud dev environments on lightning-fast cloud machines that can be managed centrally. This brings the speed, security, and flexibility of the cloud to help devs build better products.

short_description: Fast chemical measurements for drug development and manufacturing
description: Andson Biotech helps pharmaceutical companies measure difficult to detect chemicals that they need to measure while developing and manufacturing drugs like cell-therapies or biologics. Drug companies want to use our technologies to get fast and accurate chemical measurements they do thousands of times per day for drug development and quality control.

short_description: High-resolution implantable electrodes for brain machine interfacing
description:
We create high-resolution, minimally invasive electrodes for sensing and stimulating neural activity within the brain with the goal of transforming the efficacy of deep brain stimulation (DBS), an FDA-approved therapy used to treat Parkinson’s, essential tremor and epilepsy. 

NDT's electrode leads are thinner than a human hair and unlike currently available DBS devices, our devices do not only stimulate, but also have many recordings sites, thereby enabling high-resolution, closed-loop recording and stimulation.

short_description: Stripe-like API Docs in just a few clicks
description: At Theneo we are generating Stripe-like API Docs in just a few clicks. We are working on automating the content generation process for developers so they can quickly generate high-quality API docs.

short_description: Shopify for law firms
description:
Kula is Shopify for law firms. Our software automates the business side of building a law firm, letting lawyers focus on the law. 

Since the start of the pandemic, the rate of growth in the number of US law firms has increased by 240%. The number of US law firms has increased by 13,000.

Our mission is to enable this revolution. We’re doing this together with an incredible set of early adopters. These lawyers are building their own law firms, after leaving world-leading organisations like Allen & Overy, Atrium, Carey Olson, Clifford Chance, Credit Suisse, IBM, K&L Gates, Fish & Richardson, Slaughter & May. Join us!

short_description: AI Accelerated Software Development
description: MutableAI is CoPilot for refactoring prototype quality Python code into highly readable production quality code. We are tackling Python developer inefficiency starting with Jupyter notebooks using meta programming and transformer models like Codex.

short_description: LinkedIn for low-skilled workers in LATAM
description: HoyTrabajas is The LinkedIn for low-skilled workers in Latin America. But instead of being a social network, we are a platform that allows users to exchange information about resumes and job openings in real-time. We also make companies recruit their low-skilled workers in less than 72 hours, saving at least 60% of money spent on recruiting, and 70% of their time looking for talents. We launched in October 2020. Currently, we have $185k MRR, growing +20% every month. Rubén, Vladimir, and Sebastián are technical co-founders and previously worked in the HR industry for a long time. HoyTrabajas is backed by Rebel Fund, Alan Rutledge, Kube Ventures, Flucas VC, Magic Fund, New Ventures, Y Combinator (w22), and more.

short_description: Marketplace for hiring healthcare workers in Europe
description: Through Bemlo, hiring healthcare staff takes 24 hours instead of three months. Nurses and doctors use Bemlo to keep updated on new opportunities in the ever-increasing pool of options. To find the best pay and the most exciting gigs, nurses and doctors work with up to 5 staffing agencies per year. This means keeping documents, preferences, availability and much more up to date. With Bemlo, they have one point of communication for all their work.

short_description: We let customers "Buy Now Pay Later" on any store in Europe.
description:
Joe is building a innovative and flexible DtoC Buy Now Pay Later App  in Europe powered by Tech📲.
In Europe, only 15% of e-commerce have integrated BNPL solutions and consumers don’t have access to installments very easily. 

Within Joe app and our virtual card you can buy now pay later on any store  without any technical integration. And if you already made your purchase, you can be refunded and get 3 installments

short_description: The freight marketplace for truck drivers
description: Rome is building a freight marketplace for truck drivers to find work, receive payments, and manage their business. Today, Rome helps 80+ drivers earn up to 40% more by accessing 10x more loads through scraping brokers/shippers. We’re looking to become the platform for all truck drivers and eventually own the layer between drivers and shippers.

short_description: Grow money and win $1000 every week by saving and playing games
description:
Fello is a game-based savings and investment application for the gen-z and young millennials of India to save play and earn returns more than a traditional savings bank account. We are merging the worlds of gaming and finance to make finance fun, easy and rewarding!

Users can save and invest in financial assets and for every rupee they save they get one gaming token using which they can play daily and weekly games and if they win in these games they get to win Rs.1 lakh every week!

Just within a short span of 12 weeks of launch, we onboarded 250,000 users with 92% of them being referred users, 88% of them being first-time investors who are spending over 12 minutes on an average per day on the app saving and playing games together!

short_description: Plaid for Electric Vehicles
description:
Telematica is an API and data platform for Electric Vehicles. With Telematica, companies can access telematics, battery, and other mobility data as well as remotely control EV charging with a single standardized API. 

Globally, the electric vehicle market is exploding. Particularly in India, where more than 40% of the new automobile sales are expected to be electric by 2030!

The thing that fascinates us is that virtually 100% of them are connected to the cloud, which captures and stores telematics, battery, and other mobility data. Unfortunately, there is no easy way for companies to interact with them as there is no user-friendly API or developer portal provided by any brand. For all of these vehicles, we create a single, standardized API.

Here are some immediate use cases we are powering:
1. Smart route planning, to reduce range anxiety and save money by optimizing battery usage for EV owners. 
2. Insurance companies use our telematics data to reward good drivers and also to assess battery degradation. 
3. Finally, fleets are electrifying, necessitating centralized and remote monitoring. Our API enables this transition by providing a unified interface for all vehicles irrespective of brand.

To sum up, the world is going electric and our API is going to power them all! 🚀

short_description: Platform and SDKs to create, share, and play 3D video
description: Vimmerse provides a platform and SDKs that make it easy to create, share, and play 3D video. We enable businesses to offer real-world immersive experiences that feel like being there. We are domain experts with over 200+ patents in the field and are productizing our prior work inventing the MPEG immersive video coding standard. Vimmerse is the solution that makes realism possible in the metaverse.

short_description: Software to create 3D video for VR, robotics and film.
description: We make tools for state-of-the-art 3D VR video, which fix motion sickness for a more comfortable and immersive experience. Our team's experience includes building VR cameras at Facebook, and robot perception systems at Lyft and Google X.

short_description: Venmo for B2B in Africa
Search Engine, workflow automation for Architectural & Design industry
description:
The problem - Material discovery today is a big pain for the design community

Countless hours are spent browsing to catalogues, visiting offline stores, coordinating with vendors for samples, getting quotations and finalizing materials. All of this process removes focus and causes hindrance to the process of design

The Solution - Discovery engine and AI design tools to make the process easy and seamless

We are building a digital library of materials across different categories with seamless search functionalities. On top that we are enabling the community with a image recognition tool and a digital mood board to embed the right material in the design

short_description: Apartment rental marketplace
description:
RentHop (www.renthop.com) helps renters find great apartments.  We use sophisticated data analysis to rank apartment listings based on their "freshness"​, their accuracy and completeness and the responsiveness of the manager who listed the apartment on our site.  

As a renter, you can use list-based or map-based search tools to browse listings and comprehensive search filters to narrow our 100,000+ listings to just the ones you want.  It’s easy and fast to reach out to brokers and property managers to schedule viewings and to manage responses.

You can also use our innovative "Appointments on Demand"​ feature, a map showing the real-time locations of brokers and property managers available to show apartments, to reach out and schedule viewings on the fly! 

For brokers and property managers, RentHop provides a cost-effective, easy-to-use tool to promote your listings, get qualified leads and schedule viewings.  You can also post and repost listings on the go using RentHop Manager, our mobile app for brokers and property managers, currently available in the iOS App Store.  (You can download the mobile app at https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/renthop-manager/id695651355.)

Your commitment to give good service will make you stand out on RentHop - our algorithm will credit you for your responsiveness and help give your listings the boost they need to get seen - and rented - by qualified renters.
 
Look for our mobile app for consumers, due out soon!

And please let us know any questions, thoughts or comments you may have - we'll look forward to hearing from you!  You can reach us at feedback@renthop.com.  You can also find us on Facebook, Twitter (@RentHop), Google+ and Pinterest.

short_description: Buy now, Pay later for healthcare in India
description:
SaveIN is Buy now, Pay later for healthcare in India. We help Doctors, Dentists and Veterinarians to serve 50% more customers who are otherwise unable to avail private healthcare. 

Having launched in Jan this year, we already have over 400 healthcare providers in our network and have issued $75K in loans, growing at 20% weekly and earn 6% on the loan amount 

80% Indians have no health insurance and 50% Indians are unable to pay for private healthcare. We are targeting 100M urban Indians who undertake on an average 1 healthcare procedure per year costing $200. This is a $20B dollar market opportunity

The company is founded by Jitin Bhasin who is a second time fintech founder and has previously built profitable fintech lending startup with $7M in annual revenue. The team comes with over 40 years of experience in fintech, banking, technology and consulting

Our investors include Y-combinator, Soma Capital, Leonis VC, 10X Group, Pioneer Fund, Rebel Fund, Nordstar, Grant Park Ventures, MyAsiaVC, Kube VC, Leblon Capital, Almagro GmbH, Oliver Jung and other angels

short_description: Toast for Southeast Asia
description:
DimOrder - Restaurant POS system for Southeast Asia

Founded in 2019, DimOrder is a Hong Kong-based technology company transforming the F&B industry. In addition to online payments, we allow restaurants to market to their customers, order food from their suppliers, and receive short term loans. Through one single platform, restaurateurs can easily manage their business and focus on their passion, we let the chef be chef.

short_description: Bringing physical collectibles to the blockchain.
description:
Courtyard stores physical collectibles (trading cards, sneakers, watches, etc.) in secured vaults, creates a 3D representation of the asset and mints it as an NFT on the blockchain. We’ve partnered with one of the largest security companies in the world to store collectibles.

Once the physical collectible has been received and tokenized by Courtyard, users can:

- Trade their NFT on any Ethereum compatible marketplace
- Hold their valued collections as NFTs and connect with other collectors 
- Burn their NFT on Courtyard’s website to redeem the underlying asset (Courtyard will ship redeemed collectibles in 150+ countries).

short_description: We make carbon negative roads
description:
We are crushing roads in need of maintenance, reusing the old road materials, replacing heavy oil with carbon binding lignin. This is both a cheaper, more durable and net carbon negative method, removing ~1.5 tonnes CO2 from the atmosphere from every 100 feet of road. 

We offer Crushing As A Service (CRAAS) to public and private road owners and refurbishers, and are already gaining international traction. Using satellite imagery, we will monitor road status and potential, and will offer additional tech and bio enhancements to make all roads green and a solution to the climate crisis.  

We are building the road to a carbon negative future.

short_description: Opinionated platform to launch/operate apps & workloads on AWS
description:
Nullstone makes it easy to rapidly launch, scale, and maintain apps and workloads on AWS. 

We are filling the gap between Heroku and an in-house infrastructure team. We offer software teams a simple developer experience while keeping control of their own infrastructure.

Nullstone provides an extensive catalog of enterprise-grade software architectures that any developer can launch and operate. Additionally, a simple web interface and CLI allow a team to manage apps, datastores, and domains across multiple accounts and environments.

short_description: Shopify for WhatsApp sellers
description:
Take App is Shopify for local sellers in SE Asia; today, they take orders via WhatsApp messages. We lets them build a lightweight ecommerce site so they can take orders online.

Founder Youmin Kim is ex-Facebook Engineering Manager who launched Facebook Marketplace and Messaging Commerce in SE Asia. 

We are generating 1.7 M dollars of monthly GMV from 1,000 active sellers 

Our customers are local sellers such as restaurants and groceries. For example, a restaurant in Indonesia created their website and told us that they are saving 2 hours everyday.

Future commerce is conversational and SE Asia already started it with WhatsApp. Our vision is to build a platform to automate conversational commerce.

https://take.app

short_description: UiPath for developers. We use computer vision to automate on any tool.
tags: ['W22', 'Active', 'Artifical Intelligence', 'Open Source', 'Computer Vision', 'Robotic Process Automation', 'Developer Tools']
full_location: São Paulo, State of São Paulo, Brazil
description:
The rise of Robotic Process Automation offered a promise that any business user can build automations. We were skeptical about that and decided to talk to users of platforms such as UiPath, Automation Anywhere, and Blueprism, all of them low-code.

Talking to users, we discovered that unique automations incorporating exclusive company processes and intelligence that have the potential to transform the business must be implemented by tech teams. It's not about mimicking employees performing isolated tasks. It's about designing a new workflow, integrated with the company's technological stack and systems. There are just 100.000 RPA skilled users compared to 22M developers globally that can become RPA coders on Day 1 with BotCity.

We believe that all automation efforts in a single platform is more efficient. We started delivering the best RPA experience for tech teams, but we envision creating the perfect place to also manage crawlers, integrations, scrappers, data operations. Every company automation in a single place.

As companies are becoming tech first and automation will be a basic KPI, we are building to be the all-in-one automation ops management.

short_description: Tools and infrastructure for to build on crypto and web3 in Africa.
description: We build the tools and infrastructure that make it easier, faster and cheaper for anyone in Africa easy, fast and cheap to build on crypto and web3.

short_description: Operating system for trust and safety teams
description: Cinder is a flexible intelligence and investigation platform that empowers trust and safety teams to make faster and more accurate decisions on the abusive content, fraud, and threats facing their company. By integrating relevant data sources, centralizing decision making, and offering customizable workflows, Cinder powers more effective decisioning for investigative teams across an enterprise.

short_description: All in one finance platform for borderless businesses in Africa
description:
Nash enables finance teams to manage all their finance flows in one place and craft their money flow experiences globally.  Our ledger-based operating system allows your borderless business to connect all your money accounts, accounting systems, payment service providers, treasury operations, spend management in one place. 

Our mission is to enable borderless commerce in Africa. We achieve this initially by providing your team with all the finance tools needed to build, scale, and grow your borderless business without the need for a costly and complex in-house infrastructure.

short_description: An employee up-skilling platform for fast growing companies
description:
An up-skilling platform that empowers teams with continuous learning tracks to equip them with the right skills at the right time. 

Our up-skilling programs are customised to business objectives of organisations across sales, customer success, general management, technology & product functions & promote employee development by enhancing their existing competencies and developing newer ones. 

AntWalk is powered by 3000+ Experts from 500+ Global Brands across 40+ Countries to power these courses and 1:1 Interactions.

short_description: Helps large Indian companies manage and resolve small legal disputes.
description:
Legistify makes it easy for large Indian companies to manage and resolve small legal disputes.
These companies have billions of dollars stuck in millions of such disputes that could easily be tracked and settled through our software.

short_description: Group Financing for small businesses across Africa.
description:
Moni finances small businesses in groups across Africa. The collective responsibility of the group serves as a collateral on the loan while the social pressure from the members ensures on-time repayment. There are over 44million SMBs in Africa. 
 
We launched 7 months ago and we already have $72k MRR growing at 50% MoM. We achieved 99% repayment on 11,000 units of loans with over $5M disbursed. This is 15 times higher than most financial services in Africa.
 
Femi (CEO) worked previously with the World Bank with a focus on financial services while Dapo (CTO) led the development of the technology for one of the largest digital lending apps

We are also backed by Y Combinator(W22), Magic Fund, Ventures Platform, Voltron Capital and more.

short_description: Marketplace for investing in large real estate deals
description:
Cash Flow Portal is a marketplace for investing in large real estate deals. 

We launched 5 months ago, and we have 65K ARR, growing 50% month over month, with 300 syndicators and 3,000 investors. 

We’ve grown quickly because I am a syndicator myself. Having raised $20MM for my own deals, I know how painful it is to manually prepare Docusigns, send wire instructions and wrangle investors. I also happen to be friends with 2,000 other syndicators just like me needing a solution for managing their investors. 

I’m not just a syndicator. I spent most of my career as an engineering leader at Lyft, Twitter, and Amazon. 

$20K ARR per syndicator gives us a $2B TAM. Having achieved my own financial freedom through real estate investing, our mission is to serve all real estate investors and help them achieve financial freedom.

short_description: Automated technical onsite interviews
description: Litebulb makes it easy for engineering teams to run high-quality technical interviews without sacrificing valuable engineering time. When your team needs to rapidly grow, instead of having your engineers sit through multiple interviews a day, you can conduct interviews via Litebulb and leave your engineers to write code. We do this by simulating regular development work and extracting a candidate's technical skills data from their interview.

short_description: We deliver toll-free internet apps
description:
Simplifyd enables businesses deliver their internet apps (websites/mobile apps) data-free, similar to toll-free telephone lines. We do this through our Zerodata app

Founded in August of 2021 and based in Lagos, Nigeria and Nairobi, Kenya, Simplifyd through its Zerodata platform is a trusted marketplace for data-free internet apps. 

Businesses list their internet apps (websites/mobile apps) on the Zerodata platform so end users can access them data-free!

End users simply need to download the Zerodata app, available for both mobile and desktop, toggle on and enjoy access to listed apps data-free!

We are on a mission to make apps accessible to over ~2B people in emerging economies who simply cannot afford the costs of internet data subscriptions.

short_description: The Disney+ for Muslim Children
description:
We create and license high quality Islamic cartoons and shows that kids watch on our subscription app.

We are the right team to do this because we previously created an Islamic cartoon with more than 3 billion views on YouTube.

All parents want their kids to grow up with values and virtues close to them. The same goes for Muslim parents - but the reality is - they are struggling to get high quality Islamic content for their kids.

We are addressing an underserved market of 70 million Muslim families with internet access globally.

short_description: A private bank for the next generation of wealth
description: Our mission is to empower young professionals to build their wealth. We're creating an elevated banking experience, with curated investment opportunities in private markets and financial solutions tailored to employment and compensation.

short_description: No-code data observability and monitoring
active_founders: ['Alexandros Chaaraoui', 'Oleg Kozynenko', 'Jose Padilla', 'Jose Luis Perez', 'Pedro Trujillano']
description:
Trackingplan automatically discovers and monitors all the information your applications and websites are collecting, ensuring that you can trust your BI, analytics, marketing, and sales tools. 

You can think of us as Segment Protocols but totally transparent, where developers can keep using Google Analytics, Amplitude, Hubspot, Intercom, Braze, etc. as they are used to. 

Installed in minutes in using your Tag Manager or adding just one line of code to your web or apps, we model all the data being sent to third parties. Since Trackingplan understands what each piece of data means, it identifies patterns, detects anomalies, and automatically connects the dots to create value from data that was hidden in plain sight:

- An always up-to-date single source of truth and data governance tool. To discover, understand and document your data and improve communication across teams.
- Automated notifications when something breaks or changes. To make sure that integrations are always well implemented: Schema errors, traffic anomalies, rogue events... 
- Easy to understand, customizable, cross-service alerts. To detect trends, insights, and problems without using complex, engineer-oriented solutions.

short_description: The Postgres Data Warehouse
description:
Hydra's mission is to make data warehouses accessible to every developer - easy to use, free from lock-in, and with cloud scale.

With Hydra, companies unify and analyze data with the ease of Postgres and the warehouse engine of their choice: Postgres, Snowflake, and BigQuery. Start small and build around the tools developers prefer. It's frictionless to swap back-end engines and eliminates lock-in.

short_description: Smart assistant for doctors to automate documentation and coding
description:
Arintra helps doctors save time and maximize their reimbursement. We do this by automating their clinical documentation and medical coding.  Our software captures patient details before visit, and converts it to clinical notes and subsequently medical codes. Arintra is used by > 100  doctors daily and processes 30,000 patient visits / month.

Both founders have PhDs in AI, significant ML and NLP experience, 60+ patents and publications, and a combined 20+ years of experience working at B2B companies and startups in Silicon Valley.

short_description: Software to prevent downtime in a solar plant
description:
SmartHelio provides a software that helps solar utilities automatically predict and prevent downtime disruptions. We help solar utilities to generate extra $200k per plant income on $10k spent using our software, by preventing 700 faults per year.

We have a platform which reads live data (current, voltage, weather parameters) from a solar plant, runs algorithms to decouple various factors for the underperformance and provides recommendations to fix it. This data is 100% available for the large scale solar in the world just using software (e.g. APIs). 

Product launch: https://www.producthunt.com/posts/heliocloud

Our cloud software is being used by 40+ leading solar developers in Europe and Asia. We have analyzed 25+ billion of  data points from over 3 GW of solar assets spread across the globe in the last 2 years.

short_description: Actually fun remote team socials
description:
Campfire helps remote teams have actually fun virtual socials. Netflix, Lattice, Spotify, Twilio and more than 80 other leading remote teams use Campfire to stay connected. 

Reach out to Siamak at siamak@campfire.to if you'd like to help realize our vision for a more fullfilling remote future.

short_description: Browser extension tells sales teams what to say
description:
Demo Gorilla is a browser extension for live SaaS demos that tells your sales team exactly what to say to sell your product.

Keep everyone on the same page with the best customer stores, competitive talking points and feature explanations. Collect insights across product, engineering, marketing, and sales experts to ensure your sales team always knows exactly what will close this deal.

- Automatically get relevant talking points for the part of the product you're on and who you're talking to
- Track notes and metrics back in to your CRM
- Share slides and images in line while demoing to set the stage
- Clean up your UI to keep attendees focused

short_description: A toolbox to collect and analyse in-app user feedback
description: Blitzllama makes it easy for product development teams to rapidly collect user feedback at scale. With only a simple SDK integration, teams can ask questions to their users within product journeys and get highly contextual answers in minutes. This empowers product teams to ship products that address users' real problems that increase user retention, engagement and reduce churn.

short_description: Yunit is the app for investment groups
description: Yunit is the app for investment groups. We make it easy & safe for people to invest in stocks and crypto together.

short_description: On demand provider of meat to households and food businesses
description: Sendme is an on-demand provider of clean meat to individuals and food businesses. We built a chatbot that lets customers place orders for meat on WhatsApp and they get it within 3hours.

short_description: Enabling offline payments in Africa
description: Vendy provides an alternative payment infrastructure without the need for a payment card or consumer app that enables customers to pay businesses on their phones without internet access.

short_description: a platform for monetizing premium short film entertainment
description:
Argo is on a mission to empower Film and TV makers worldwide.  
It’s the easiest way to upload and monetize your content. 
Argo provides the technology and the ecosystem for the Filmmakers to monetize their film and tv work through advertising, subscription and NFT sales.  
Argo is the first Film NFT platform, revolutionizing Film and TV distribution and enabling the creators to build a deeper relationship with their audiences.

short_description: Smart, virtual receptionists for local businesses.
description: Lovage Labs creates automated, virtual receptionists for businesses that can handle almost any customer need over the phone, via text, or on social media. Instead of hiring someone or having to deal with interruptions while working, Lovage helps your customers by answering questions, booking appointments, and more - just like you would.

short_description: Software for enterprises to track and reduce supply chain emissions
description: With Aklimate, enterprises provide their suppliers with carbon management tools for free, in exchange for their emissions data. You can imagine it as the company paying for a Watershed-lite for each of their suppliers.

short_description: All-in-one expense management automation solution
description: Fuell is an expense management software that helps European companies manage card payments and reimbursements. We automatize expense management so that the employees, bookkeepers, and CFOs can save money and time. We're live in Spain and Portugal. We are working toward a future we call “pay and leave.” Where the employee just has to pay and the receipt is directly sent from the merchant to Fuell, without the employee having to do anything.

short_description: Meesho for Africa - Enabling Africans to sell online with zero capital
about_founders: [{'name': 'Evans Darbo Boateng', 'role': '', 'social_media_links': ['https://twitter.com/quajoduke', 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/evans-darbo-boateng']}, {'name': 'Evans Darbo Boateng', 'role': '', 'social_media_links': ['https://twitter.com/quajoduke', 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/evans-darbo-boateng']}, {'name': 'Evans Darbo Boateng', 'role': '', 'social_media_links': ['https://twitter.com/quajoduke', 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/evans-darbo-boateng']}, {'name': 'Evans Darbo Boateng', 'role': '', 'social_media_links': ['https://twitter.com/quajoduke', 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/evans-darbo-boateng']}]
description:
Tendo enables anyone in Africa to sell online with zero upfront inventory - our mobile app connects dropshippers to local wholesalers. The sellers on the platform are able to source products through Tendo and resell items using social commerce tools, such as WhatsApp, arrange delivery, and get paid, all through the Tendo mobile app.

At the moment, people who want to sell online need to save money, visit hundreds of suppliers to find a trusted one, and risk losing their capital by stocking up inventory. Beyond this, they need to incur costs for logistics and warehousing. We eliminate all that.

short_description: Building an open-source webhooks infrastructure.
description:
We are building Convoy, an open-source cloud-native webhook service, with out-of-the-box security, reliability, and scalability for your webhooks infrastructure. - https://getconvoy.io

Publishing webhooks today is highly fragmented. There exist no sane open-source tool to enable engineers to build and ship highly scalable webhooks infrastructure. This is exactly what we set out to solve. 

Essentially, just like Redis is to key-value storage, and Gitlab is to DevOps, Convoy is to webhooks.

short_description: Pan-African digital bank for Africa's 50m businesses
description: Lenco is a multi-currency digital bank for businesses in Africa. With Lenco, retail outlets, hospitality businesses and startups can easily pay vendors, suppliers and perform cross-border payment while having access to growth capital.

short_description: All-in-one KYC/Identity Verification Platform for Africa
description: Dojah is an all-in-one identity and verification platform for technology companies in Africa. We have built the most robust API that collates financial, government and facial identity to capture a wholistic, end to end verification of an individual.

short_description: AI based Customizable Subscription & Revenue Management Platform
description:
SubscriptionFlow is an AI-based customizable revenue management platform that helps SMBs optimize subscription revenue. It monitors user activity to identify customers at risk of churning and automatically alerts the sales team.

For example, eLearning/SaaS/Membership businesses require to monitor subscription usage to improve customer retention. Ecommerce/Magazine companies need to see the subscription trends to cross-sell and upsell products/services.
