short_description: 10x-1000x faster compute for Neural Network training
description: Strong Compute is building the future of Cloud Computing, priced by performance not consumption. Our software and hardware optimizations speed up neural network development 10x-1000x, file transfer 1000x, instance start time 10x.  We're starting with AI and are aimed at the $500B cloud market.

short_description: Foreign bank accounts for remote workers
description: Grey provides USD, EUR, GBP accounts for remote workers in developing countries starting from Africa. For the first time, western companies feel comfortable recruiting skilled workers from anywhere and Grey is making it easy for these workers to receive their salary, save in foreign currency, convert to local currency and spend.

short_description: Decentralized Finance & Crypto for Families
description:
Finnt is the first DeFi app for families.
We provide multi-user, high yield saving accounts, which make it easy to save with crypto for your children or family members

short_description: Robo-advisory platform for Pakistan
description: We're building the equivalent of 401ks for Pakistan as the first step towards building a comprehensive wealth management platform for the country.

short_description: FullStory for 3D experiences
description: Bonsai Desk provides an SDK that developers integrate into their games, and our analytics engine surfaces 3D recordings of users struggling with their game's mechanics. With gaming reaching the mainstream and increasingly monetized as a service, developers need new analytics built for 3D.

short_description: We stop cows from burping methane.
description:
We chemically modify kelp to create a feed additive for cattle that stops them from producing methane. This makes the cow more efficient, saving the farmer 20% on feed costs. 

Cattle burps are the single largest source of anthropogenic methane. Our product allows farmers to prevent these emissions and get paid in carbon credits and efficiency gains for doing so.

short_description: Robinhood for Southeast Asia
description:
Tradezi is the Robinhood for Southeast Asia. We aim to help everyone invest in stocks, crypto, and other alternative assets all in one place. 

With a strong founding team with many years of experiences building and scaling billion-user products at Facebook and Google, we provide our users the most seamless and reliable investing experience to meet the current unprecedented growth in Southeast Asia - which is something most incumbent players are struggling with.

short_description: Identity Verification API for Africa
description: We are making it possible for digital businesses in Africa to easily verify their customers within seconds.

short_description: Advanced Personal Cybersecurity for Enterprises
description:
Agency performs enterprise-level cybersecurity for individuals at the highest risk of cyberattacks because of their job, employer, or industry. Our subscription includes advanced software, 24/7 monitoring and response, and reimbursement with our Agency Cyber Guarantee. 

We help organizations get advanced security for their largest threat surface while maintaining the privacy of their teams. Agency turns cybersecurity from a burden into a perk.

short_description: Social Robinhood where friends can collaborate, compete and co-invest
description:
As investing is being democratised, it is also becoming increasingly social. This especially holds true for the new generation of investors (18-35 years of age), who often turn to their friends for trustworthy sparring. 50% of young investors say that they discuss "all or most" of their investments with their closest friends.

Today, this is done in closed WhatsApp groups with users dumping screenshots or sending third-party links. A truly shared investing experience? Difficult. Co-investing? Not possible. Not only has consumer behaviour changed, so has the financial building blocks.

At Pluto we are building the leading investing app for friend-groups enabling them to collaborate, compete and co-invest powered by fractional shares and zero-commission trading. We firmly believe that social is the next disruptive wave which can unlock investing for even more people around the world and improve financial literacy.

Join our mission!

short_description: Credit Card for college students based on UPI.
description: More than 150 million people in India are not able to access formal Credits in India either because of lack of financial data or low credit scores. We use Alternative Credit scoring models to provide a Pay Later option on UPI to a wider audience.

short_description: No-code analytics tool for modern teams
description: Livedocs is a no-code analytics tool for modern teams. We are building a document editor that helps non-technical operators build reports with live data from tools like Stripe, Google Analytics, Segment without writing code.

short_description: App for healthcare workers to fill out forms using speech
description: voize is the digital voice assistant for non-desk workers. Professionals like physicians, nurses, test engineers, and scientists spend over 2.5 hours on documentation every day. voize helps them finish it in minutes. The user speaks freely into a smartphone and the voize AI automatically generates structured documentation records. We transfer these documentation records into the existing enterprise software systems of the organization.

short_description: Test & Debug Web and Mobile Applications for different API errors
description:
Requestly records all API traffic and allows developers to modify response for any API request without changing anything on the backend. For example - As an Uber engineer, I'd like to test what happens when driver allotment API fails, is there an automatic retry or do we ask the user to retry, or does the app crash. Available as a browser extension on all major browsers & as a desktop app on all platforms.

We are already in production with 40000+ developers across 500+ organizations using Requestly.

short_description: 'Office' Suite for Mobile-first Businesses in India
description:
Kaagaz is an 'Office' Suite for Mobile-first Businesses in India. With Kaagaz, these users can manage all the document requirements for their business using their smartphone itself, without needing a Desktop.

We have scaled to 3M MAUs in the last 1.5 years & continue to grow at 10% every month. Having started monetization 8 weeks ago, we already have 2000 paying users, growing our revenue 50% every month.

With over 200M such businesses in India, at $15/year subscription price, this a $3B opportunity in India & much larger globally.

We are a team of 2nd time entrepreneurs having scaled the pervious startup to $1M in GMV. We are backed by YCombinator, Goodwater Capital, Pravega Venture, Better Capital & other investors including Alan Rutledge (TrendMD) and Farid Ahsan (Sharechat)

short_description: Corporate Expense cards and Spend management for businesses in Africa
description:
Boya Makes it easy for businesses in Africa to issue corporate expense cards instantly and great software to control and track spending. For example, if you run a pharmaceutical company, you can use Boya to instantly issue Visa cards to sales and marketing teams and get real-time visibility and control over their spending.

50M+ businesses in Africa have no easy way to streamline and track their employee spending in real-time. So we are building a corporate card and a spend management platform that enables businesses to streamline spend workflows and provide real-time reporting. We are building the first corporate card that supports mobile money, banks and card schemes payment workflows

short_description: Plaid for Insurance in Africa
description:
One API to sell & process insurance across Africa.
At Curacel, our goal is to make it easy and pleasant to get & use insurance in emerging markets.
We are building the rails to make insurance work for the next billion Africans.

short_description: Flexible pension plans for SMEs in MENA.
description:
FinFlx makes it easier and more affordable for SME to offer defined contribution pension plans in line with local labour laws.
Employers can launch a pension plan within hours instead of weeks, with fully digital employee record management, plan administration, investment selection and detailed reporting.
FinFlx is the future of workplace retirement solutions in the Middle East.

short_description: Precision mental health care for women
description:
LunaJoy is a precision mental health platform that is specialized in women's mental health through all phases of life including adolescence, pregnancy, postpartum, infertility, miscarriage, loss, perimenopause, and aging. We deliver care by creating a specialized workforce to provide targeted psychotherapy, medication management + genetic testing, coaching, and holistic wellness. LunaJoy utilizes technology and data science to provide intelligent touchpoints that decrease costs and accelerate outcomes. We are increasing our in-network footprint to provide truly accessible care for all. 

Women are twice as likely to experience mental health difficulties. Rates are even higher for women of color and LGBTQ+ folks. Women are 3x more likely to experience sexual, physical, emotional trauma which is a predictor for mental illness. This is just the tip of the iceberg! Physiologically, women experience hormonal fluctuations which make them more vulnerable to mental health issues during times of transition such as puberty, pregnancy, postpartum, and menopause. We also face unique stressors as the emotional bedrock of our homes, supporting young families, elderly adults, and a huge part of the workforce. The downstream effects of this gap in care are far-reaching into our ecosystems. Currently, mental health care is expensive, inconvenient, and generalist where a specialized approach is needed. When we attend to women’s mental health, we all shine brighter!

short_description: OS for 100 Mn K-12 Classroooms
description:
Edustack, is an EdTech SaaS platform. We are building OS for 100 Mn Indian classrooms. Edustack saves 1000's of hours for teachers by helping them to assign digitised worksheets, send reminders, automate evaluation and instantaneously generate analytics. 
Digital worksheets are our wedge to penetrate in the to classroom's

short_description: Allow finance and ops teams to build data tools.
description: Supersheets enables anyone to build tools on top of your database without writing any code. You can find and transform data like you're in a spreadsheet, as well as sync data to your Google Sheets.

short_description: No-code workflow analytics
description:
Takt is a no-code workflow analytics tool. If a process starts in Hubspot and ends in Asana, Takt will show the performance of this process end-to-end.

The explosion of no-code tools has led to millions of untracked workflows. We integrate with your tools and give you end-to-end visibility of mission critical processes.

short_description: Investment super app for Latin America
full_location: San José Province, San José, Costa Rica
description:
Botin a mobile app where people in Latin America can invest in US Stocks, Crypto and more. 

We are building a one stop shop product for consumers to create wealth in Latin America by giving them the investment tools of the 1%.

short_description: Automating EV battery recycling
description: Posh automates EV battery recycling. There are 30 million battery packs retiring from EV between now and 2030. Most of these batteries have 80% capacity unused and thousands of dollars worth of precious metals. Today a lot of these retired batteries are sitting in warehouses because they are processed manually. We are changing this by making battery disassembly fast, safe and scalable, with 10x efficiency. Our automation system takes the uncertainties out of the equation. We bring affordable lithium-ion batteries to the mass and help create a circular economy for our electric future.

short_description: Learn English by speaking with an AI
description:
Toko helps English learners in East Asia achieve speaking fluency. Through our mobile app, learners engage in short, realistic conversations with an AI and receive feedback on their grammar.

With over 150 topics, learners can practice real-world scenarios ranging from small talk to workplace discussions. Toko offers a low-pressure environment to help learners build up their confidence.

short_description: Multicolor lasers for ultrafast data transmission
description: Enlightra develops mass-manufacturable fingertip-size multicolor lasers enabling ultrafast data communication and optical computing while providing up to 10x improvement in energy efficiency and cost reduction.

short_description: Query data without writing SQL
description: Cogram lets anybody query data without writing SQL. Users ask questions in plain English—Cogram translates them into database queries, runs them, and visualizes the results.

short_description: Reselling marketplace for social media entrepreneurs in Pakistan
description:
We enable WhatsApp, Facebook, and Instagram-based micro-entrepreneurs to source wholesale products from across Pakistan. Our marketplace enables these micro-entrepreneurs to start their business without any investment while we facilitate them by offering their customers a great experience. We do this by taking care of their delivery operations, payments, and customer services. 

Pakistan is one of the youngest populations globally and is expected to become the 7th largest consumer market by 2030. Our vision is empowering 5 M + people, especially women, to start their businesses while working from home and supercharging the eCommerce rails of Pakistan.

short_description: Simple Payroll Solution for Africa
description: We are Gusto for Africa. Eazipay is a simple, 5-minute payroll payment solution for Africa. We have grown from 10 businesses in January to over 200 with over $5k MRR. Eazipay processes 8 payroll payment types (Taxes, Pension, Insurances, etc) with just one-click and with our own payment infrastructure. Eazipay Payroll APIs are also available for neobanks and commercial banks - to reach at least 50k businesses.

short_description: Affirm for LATAM
description:
Under "Buy Now, Pay Later" business model, Wibond is a 100% flexible digital payment method enabling the 200 million underbanked consumers without credit cards to shop online for the first time. 

We integrate directly into the purchase flow of online merchants, and we offer consumers a credit, when they have already made up their mind that they want to acquire a specific product.
We provide financial and digital access to a large community of people offering payment options according to their possibilities and profile. Wibond is an inclusive and simple solution:
 - Consumers can create their free account to quickly access and pay without banks, in installments, and without a card.
 - Merchants with e-commerce channels increase their sales and integrate Wibond in a very agile way by offering a new form of payment and expanding their markets.

We’re also integrated in the purchase flow of more than 500 merchants, including Samsung, Musimundo (one of the Biggest retailers in LATAM) , and Motorola. And up to 65% of the payment transactions on these sites go through us.

short_description: APIs to make your app multiplayer, just like Figma.
description:
With Snippyly APIs, developers can make their apps multiplayer & collaborative, just like Figma.

Today, 99% of all online tools we work with are siloed and not collaborative. For example: If I have a question on a dashboard, I cannot ask it inside the dashboard. I have to leave the dashboard and goto a 3rd party tool like zoom or slack to collaborate. It makes no sense.

That’s why we built Snippyly.

We’re a team of ex-Googlers. We've launched products like Augmented Reality in Google Search & Maps, Google Local Services.

Like Okta is to Auth, Algolia is to Search, Snippyly is to Collaboration. We are building the collaboration infrastructure for the internet.

We imagine a future where you can collaborate with anyone from anywhere. Snippyly will make the world more collaborative & build more great things together. 

Come join us in this exciting journey ahead 🚀

short_description: Enabling banks have a fintech-style loan origination process
description: Digiventures SaaS enables banks in Latin America to digitize their loan origination and account opening process. We are live with 30 clients (including 7 banks) in 9 countries.

short_description: Simplified Banking as a Service for Latam
description: PayCaddy enables Latam companies to launch financial products with an API based platform. Rather than building fintech from scratch, or dealing with a legacy bank, companies can use PayCaddy to open digital wallets with KYC checks, automate online payments, and issue personalized debit and prepaid cards for customers or employees.

short_description: Open source software that cleans and transforms messy healthcare data.
description: At Tuva Health, we make open source software that cleans and transforms messy healthcare data.  We’re founded by Aaron Neiderhiser and Coco Zuloaga, former senior execs from Health Catalyst and Strive Health.  We realized data transformation and data quality is the fundamental problem preventing the healthcare industry from building scalable data products.  We launched Tuva and joined the W22 batch of Y Combinator to solve this problem for the entire industry.  Since January 1st, we signed our first customer (paying $10k per month) and completed the first major release of the Tuva Project.  At Tuva, our goal is to (1) become the open standard for healthcare data transformation and (2) build the data network for multi-site benchmarking, research, and machine learning on top of this open standard.

short_description: Easy foreign payments for Africa
description: We're providing payment rails and APIs to help African merchants and consumers easily move money in and out of Africa.

short_description: The complete way to do compensation
description: The complete way to communicate compensation, starting with our interactive offer letters.

short_description: Android phone dialer app for young people
description:
Tingo is an android dialer app for young people in India. Every day over 40K people use Tingo to set video ringtones for their friends and family. We are growing at 17% weekly and handled 25M+ phone calls through the app in the last 2 months.

The company is built by technical co-founders Chalam (prev Lead ML Engineer @ Snapdeal, IIT Grad) and Sandilya (prev Software Engineer @ Microsoft, IIIT Grad) who know each other for over 12 years after meeting at high school. 

Our vision is to be the phone dialer app for 2.5Bn smartphone users worldwide.

short_description: Modern stock trading for Vietnam
description: Anfin is building a modern trading experience for the retail investors of Vietnam. Anfin is built upon key principles of intuitive design through experimentation, expanded access through fractional shares, and financial literacy through modern forms of education.

short_description: Disrupting Indian Insurance space by empowering agents
description:
India’s insurance market is filled with bygone products, which do not cater to 95% of the market's demand for specific products such as illness-specific insurance, primary care with insurance, and surgical insurance to name a few. 

We, at IMT, aim to target this white space by creating innovative products that fulfill this new demand by empowering the agents. Agents are the largest insurance distribution channel in India and cover 85% of the premium collection. 

Agents collect 20B premium every year. With a 5% take rate, it’s a 1B dollar market opportunity growing at 22% CAGR.

Kunal has 15+ years of experience working with insurance companies and building agent networks, while he scaled his brokerage business to 3M dollars in revenue. Rachit has 12+ years of experience in building tech products, he was a founding engineer at Payu (stripe of India).

short_description: B2B Cross-Border Payment & Compliance Platform
description: Salt is a neo banking solution stitched together to ease payments and documentation which comes with business banking by moving it to a digital-first and automated end to end platform.

short_description: Helping physicians select the right therapy for breast cancer patients
description: NearWave makes a handheld imaging device that helps physicians select the right therapy for their breast cancer patients. This prevents patients from suffering through months of side effects caused by unsuccessful treatments.

short_description: Find a home you can actually afford
description: Stairs helps young Americans buy their first home. Our home search identifies homes based on their finances, and connects them to government grants, loans and tax breaks.

short_description: TurboTax for Construction Permitting
description: Intuitive workflow software that helps general contractors and developers identify the optimal permitting process and needed application forms for a particular project, and then easily fill the relevant paperwork to prepare a robust application package.

short_description: Marketing & distribution as-a-service in Southeast Asia
description:
Power to the Brand is a marketing and distribution as-a-service in Southeast Asia – a region twice the population size of the US, with some of the fastest growing economies. A consumer brand sends us their goods – we'll do their local social media marketing, take payments and make deliveries for them, in 11 different countries. Instantly access years of personal relationships, know-how and locally-integrated systems.

The company was founded by Yee Meng and Rasmus, and builds on top an already successful multi-brand retail and corporate gifts business in Singapore. 

We have clients such as Maverick & Co, an FC Barcelona merchandise partner, and memobottle, a brand that was included in the Oscars’ goodie bags. Power to the Brand is backed by Y-Combinator.

short_description: Usage-based billing for API companies
description:
Kable makes it easy for developers to add usage-based billing, invoicing, analytics, and authentication to their API products with just three lines of code.

We help API companies bring their products to market faster, more securely, and with flexible billing tools that help businesses scale. We provide everything needed to create a delightful experience for developer communities and to optimize revenue while giving time back to engineering teams to focus on what matters most.

short_description: Automating code documentation
description: Mintlify helps you document code x10 faster using AI.

short_description: Amazon-level personalization for Shopify merchants
description: Suggestr is a self-serve, no-code personalization solution for the 20M+ e-commerce brands that sell on platforms like Shopify. Marketplaces like Amazon drive up to 30% of their sales from personalized surfaces (recommendations, bundles, frequently bought together, et cetera). They have large data science teams that build such in-house recommendation engines. However, DTC brands can't afford to do this, and they don't have enough customer data to make the conventional recommendation approaches work. Suggestr uses innovative multi-modal AI technology that sees and understands products (needs 100x less data), allowing it to work with brands of all sizes (SME, mid-market, enterprise). The solution takes less than 30 minutes to integrate and helps merchants increase online store revenues by up to 10% with AI-driven upsells and cross-sells.

short_description: Premium crypto platform, automating asset & yield management
description:
Founded in the latter half of 2021 and based in San Francisco, California, earnJARVIS automates asset and yield management for the crypto economy.

What started as 2 brand name assets, BTC & ETH, has now turned into a cryptoverse filled with blockchains, digital assets, protocols, and more. Accessing, diversifying, and learning across this maze is a full-time job, but it is critical to creating a diversified portfolio in the industry.

We help users create diversified portfolios while ensuring their assets are efficiently deployed into the crypto economy to earn them yield through staking or Decentralized Finance – so their crypto earns crypto.

While we currently serve consumers, we aim to develop earnJARVIS into a SaaS platform for every kind of wealth manager. 

New technologies aren't adopted overnight. It takes a whole team to make something as big as mainstream adoption happen. We work hard, dream big, and envision a future where decentralized finance is the standard. And, most importantly, we are having fun along the way.

short_description: Data Infrastructure-as-a-Platform for Start/Scale-ups
about_founders: [{'name': 'Piet Jan de Bruin', 'role': '', 'social_media_links': ['https://www.linkedin.com/in/pietjandebruin/']}, {'name': 'Piet Jan de Bruin', 'role': '', 'social_media_links': ['https://www.linkedin.com/in/pietjandebruin/']}]
description: iomete is the first complete data infrastructure delivered as a single platform. It’s an all-in-one solution that replaces Snowflake (Lakehouse), Databricks (Jobs and ETL), Fivetran (Onboarding 3rd party data), Informatica (Data Governance), and Looker/Tableau (BI) with a single platform.

short_description: Carta for Web3: token vesting and DeFi investment management.
description:
Magna is building a platform to turn DeFi investments into financial primitives. Our first product is Carta for Web3, where companies can manage their cap tables and distribute their token equity to employees, advisors, or investors. We’re also building investor infrastructure for institutions to custody investments with on-chain execution and intelligence. Our ultimate goal is to use locked tokens as composable building blocks to power collateralized lending, liquid secondary markets, and other DeFi applications.

Launching a token? Let's chat. Are you receiving tokens from your investments? We can also be helpful.


What are our companies saying about the problem?

> Having it all bundled together would make life easier. We have a million things to do. If you have an off-the-shelf thing, we’d use it.
> This wouldn’t be a nice to have, it’d be a have to have.
> Terrible process. We’re manually sending out transactions, going to solscan and manually check that they received our token. Takes hours every week.
> Everything we do is potentially very dangerous. We have to check it thoroughly. I’ve spent several hours a day on this since launch. I imagine every month, it’ll take us at least 1-2 days.
> Manual process every month for the ops team. They likely burn a week.... every month to pay out 150+ addresses.

short_description: Airtable for 400 Million SMBs Globally
description: RecordBook is one stop solution to manage all business DATA, WORKFLOWS & TEAMS for Small and Medium Businesses on their mobile devices & in their local languages.

short_description: Expert-led, live courses for employees
description:
ScholarSite is a platform that allows leading experts to run live-cohort based courses with companies around the world. 

Professional learners are taught by a world class expert, each cohort is directly applicable to a specific job role and they join a lifelong community of like-minded professionals - all at a fraction of the price and in a far more flexible, engaging format than traditional and online degrees.

Instructors gain huge financial upside (80% of course earnings), they build their brand with leading companies and Scholarsite takes care of distribution, community management and administration (payments, scheduling, content management etc).

We've sold into over 500 companies (across software, financial services, retail + more), we're generating $40k in monthly revenue and we have $100k in annual contracts with companies like Stripe, Shopify, Flipkart and Accenture. 

Our vision is to become the world's largest decentralized corporate university.

short_description: Natural Language Understanding API for Speech that runs on device
description:
Speechly makes it cost efficient to understand human conversations, in real-time. We do this by enabling high-accuracy spoken language understanding processed right on the end user’s device.

Hundreds of millions of hours of audio data are generated every single day online. Speechly is the first solution that can affordably turn this audio into actionable insights.

short_description: Automating all IT operations
description: Stackshine is creating mission control for enterprise IT teams. We discover all the software being used across their organization and then automate workflows related to onboarding/offboarding, cost savings, and security.

short_description: Enable Buy-Now-Pay-Later in a White-Labelled Manner
description:
We enable brands to launch Credit-as-a-Feature in under 5 mins. They can simply use our Plugins or Copy-Paste style APIs and go live in under 5 minutes without worrying about how Credit Risk or Capital/Compliances etc will work. Simply connect with the BharatX platform and start disbursing Credit. 

Be it to enable a White-Labelled Pay Later option on Checkout or to give your Neobank's users a White-Labelled Instant Credit-Line option.  You can enable it all, as fast as 5 mins!

So next time you buy a course on Frontrow use "Frontrow Pay in 3" and while shopping offline, @Spenny's (YC) "Credit" feature to pay to Merchants Offline on UPI.

short_description: Studio quality video without the studio
description: Ping Labs makes software for video creators on Youtube, Twitch and TikTok. We enable podcasters, live streamers, and more to bring guests into their video as easily as joining a Zoom call.

short_description: Lower interest rates on existing credit cards
description:
Placid Money allows people with good credit scores to significantly lower interest rates on their credit cards while keep using them. 

Users connect their credit cards to the mobile app and get a revolving credit line in under 10 minutes. Placid tracks and automatically pays off any expensive balance on connected cards, saving users thousands of dollars on interest charges and helping them pay off card balances faster and improve credit scores.

short_description: Rapid medical data annotation
description:
Teams that are building medical imaging AI use RedBrick AI to rapidly and collaboratively build high quality training datasets. 

The RedBrick AI SaaS platform offers high-performance web annotation tools for 2D and 3D data to give experts access to specialized tooling right from their browser. The RedBrick configurable workflow system helps teams build robust and scalable quality assurance processes. RedBrick AI offers a suite of APIs to help developers consume the annotations being created, and integrate with MLOps.

short_description: Stripe for AML Compliance
description: Flagright is building Stripe for AML Compliance.  It’s a risk-based transaction monitoring API that helps fintech startups quickly set up their compliance infrastructure. We are on a mission to make compliance a commodity and enable startups prevent financial crime globally. We provide customer risk profiling, real-time transaction monitoring, sanctions screening, and other partner-enabled services like KYC and crypto screening on a no-code back office portal.

short_description: Bloomberg Terminal for Government Affairs Teams
description: Axis is a knowledge base of government regulations and officials that helps large companies do business in foreign markets. For example, if you want to operate in Saudi Arabia - our software tells you which laws you need to comply with and which officials you need approvals from. We cover Saudi Arabia, UAE, Qatar, Egypt, Pakistan, Turkey, and Italy so far and are expanding to key markets in Europe, the Middle East, and Africa.

short_description: Sports Lessons Marketplace
description: HOKALI is the marketplace for buying sports lessons from more than 260,000 sports coaches in the US. We are the easiest way for them to sell their lessons online, and we take a 30% commission on every transaction.

short_description: Trucking marketplace connecting open deck carriers and shippers
description: Exo freight is a trucking marketplace for open deck shipping. Open deck shipping is how you transport large and odd-shaped loads and represents 20% of the 700 Billion dollar US transportation market

short_description: All-in-one platform to redesign and remodel homes in Southeast Asia
description:
Nook is an all-in-one platform to redesign and remodel homes in Southeast Asia, starting with just bathrooms in Vietnam. We sell homeowners a hassle-free renovation package inclusive of design, materials, and construction.

Because of our room scanning technology and curated design templates, customers get an instant, accurate quote as well as a predictable construction timelines. By matching homeowners with a vetted contractor using our project management software, customers get a best-in-class experience with quality guarantees.

short_description: 15 minutes grocery delivery for Indonesia's tier 2 cities
description: Radius offers 15 mins grocery delivery for Indonesia’s tier 2 cities. Our network of hyper-local dark stores allows customers to get groceries delivered faster and cheaper than other online providers.

short_description: A neo-banking platform for children in India
description:
At Streak, we are building a new age personalized & gamified banking solution for teenagers.

We are a fast-paced edu-fintech startup working towards redefining children and teenagers' relationship with money.

short_description: Automatic payments across banks with a single API in LATAM
description: We allow companies make payments with local wire transfers with a single API in LATAM

short_description: Fashion shopping with delivery and return on demand
description:
Ole brings fashion with delivery and return on-demand.
Customers use our app to order clothes from nearby stores, try them at home while the driver is waiting, take only what they like and return to the driver what they don't.

We already have $35k monthly GMV, growing 35% MoM.

What’s unique about our business is our average order value which is 7X higher than typical on-demand business. While their average order is $30, ours is $200, which is why we are already positive in unit economics.

short_description: One app to pay for any electric vehicle charger in the US
description: AeonCharge is a single app for electric vehicle drivers to pay for any chargers in the US. We’re the largest aggregator in the country, with 76% market coverage and access to over 60,000 charging stations.

short_description: Detect cyber attacks on critical physical infrastructure
description:
Palitronica builds and deploys cutting-edge solutions to defend critical physical infrastructure and its supply chain.

By using side-channel information from endpoints, Palitronica provides a safe attack detection capability retrofittable to critical systems.

short_description: Activate data from your warehouse into business apps (Reverse ETL)
description: Castled helps organisations sync customer and product data in realtime from cloud data warehouses like Snowflake, Redshift, BigQuery, Postgres etc to their Sales, Marketing and Support tools like Salesforce, Hubspot, Google Ads, Mixpanel, Intercom and lots more.

short_description: Superhuman for project management
description:
Dart is Superhuman for project management. It's fast, fun, and easy to use. It caters to small teams that have a mix of skills (sales, product, and leadership) while still being technically powerful for engineers. 

Dart is the first step towards executing on our vision of building the definitive project management suite for startups.

short_description: Automated sweep account, invest without the stress of speculating
description:
With Soon you can invest without the stress of speculating. Our fully automated sweep account attaches to your bank and uses routine spending activity to signal market trades.
By investing on a schedule and selling available gains when you spend, Soon automates investing from beginning to end. No investing experience required, no need to time the market, just connect Soon to your spending account and build wealth.

short_description: Quality Assurance platform for Machine Learning Systems.
description:
Armilla AI is a Quality Assurance platform for models allowing enterprises to govern, validate, test, and monitor any and all models across the enterprise in a reliable, consistent, and repeatable manner. 

We make Responsible and Trustworthy AI a reality.

short_description: Plaid for trading
description: SnapTrade is an API to connect retail brokerage accounts to any fintech app. We enable API access to real-time account data, historical transactions, and trade. This makes it possible to build new investing experiences with existing brokerage accounts, so users don't need to transfer and it's easier to get started.

short_description: Zero-Knowledge security without seed phrases or backup codes
description:
Bunkyr enables companies to protect their users’ data with a simple, hardware-secured API. When a user forgets their password, applications using Bunkyr can provide them a familiar, robust recovery method to restore access to encrypted data.

Zero-Knowledge architectures and end-to-end encryption are the only true safeguards against data breaches, but come with large user-experience burdens and engineering overhead. Bunkyr eliminates these obstacles in a way that is friendly to both developers and users, cost-effective, and extremely fast.

Users won’t even know Bunkyr exists, while their data stays protected against both breaches and lost passwords.

short_description: Analytics Platform for EHR data
description:

Built on FHIR® & SMART on FHIR®  technology.

short_description: Managed marketplace for consumer goods manufacturing
Replit for ML

short_description: “Carta for crypto / web3” - We automate token vesting and token cap…

Secure, audited smart contracts guarantee timely distribution of vesting tokens and save significant time and resources spent building your own solution.

We are building THE place for investors to learn, grow, and invest confidently.

short_description: Clear.co for LATAM. Revenue based financing for online sellers.
description:
Creizer is Clearbanc (Clear.co) for LATAM. We provide revenue-based financing to online sellers.

More than 80% of SMEs can’t have access to loans in LATAM, thus limiting their growth. They represent 99% of online sellers in the region.
 
At Creizer we built a unique risk model in which the requirements for these online sellers are 100% accessible since the scoring is based on the store’s metrics and collections on a percentage of their daily sales.
 
We are growing 65% MoM and experiencing overdemand every month. Helping our customers to grow up to 7x in less than a year.

short_description: We make it simple for call centers to automate quality assurance.
description: MosaicVoice makes it easy for call centers to automate their Quality Assurance function. Our software listens to customer conversations in real-time and identifies and alerts agents and managers to any compliance violations as they happen

short_description: SendGrid for Sales Email
description:
Lightmeter is a managed delivery service for sales emails that boosts reply rates while removing any need for maintenance and troubleshooting. It works with existing sales tools like Apollo, HubSpot, and Salesforce. We make sure outbound emails are actually delivered instead of going to spam.

We achieve this using an Open Source mailserver automation app that we built over two years, combined with our team’s industry expertise. Co-founders Sam and Suela learned how to deliver emails at scale when they were CEO and CPO of phpList and were sending 2bn emails monthly. We launched 4 weeks ago and already have 10 customers and $1.5k MRR.

short_description: We make carbon negative chemicals from CO2 using fermentation
description:
Phase Biolabs is a synthetic biology company building fermentation technology to convert carbon dioxide (CO2) emissions into carbon-negative solvents, a $10B market for the pharma, cosmetic, and paints industries. 

What we are building can also be referred to as carbon capture and utilisation (CCU) or carbon recycling/upcycling, and helps decarbonisation on two fronts. We enable large scale emitters monetise their waste CO2, while also delivering carbon negative chemicals to downstream users. Products made using carbon negative chemicals (95% of products need chemicals) create a positive climate impact by removing CO2 from the environment.

The company is founded by David Ortega, a industrial biotechnologist with a PhD in synthetic biology. To date we have industrial brewers from the EU and the UK signed up for pilots and LOIs for the purchase of $1.5M of carbon negative solvents per year.

short_description: Open-source, blazing fast alternative to corporate VPNs
description:
Firezone is building an open-source alternative to OpenVPN and Cisco AnyConnect. We're much faster than existing options because we're built on a new VPN protocol called WireGuard.
Set it up in minutes to provide your employees with secure access to your private networks, data, and applications across different networks.

short_description: Collaborative People Planning
description: 🚀 Predictive HR analytics & planning to make better decisions faster ⚡

short_description: Enable role-based access across customer groups

We provide an end-to-end solution, from frontend React components to APIs and support tools for maximum engineering efficiency and cross-functional collaboration.

short_description: Creator Led Live Commerce for India.
description:
We are building live commerce for India. We are Twitch for Fashion and Beauty, where creators can broadcast, build an audience, and monetize by selling over live streams.

Previously we built and scaled one of India’s largest fantasy sports platforms to 8m registered users and $7m in yearly revenue.

We have been live for 4 weeks- growing to over 10k downloads, $2k GMV,  and 26 creators- with an average watch time of 15 mins. We have a strong and growing partner pipeline with over 70 creators and 12 brands whose products these creators can sell.

With an average order value of $55 dollars and 150m consumers, beauty and fashion is a $24B potential market. We make money by taking a 10-12% cut on every sale.

We are experienced founders, targeting a huge opportunity that will revolutionize the way India shops.

short_description: Digital therapy for tinnitus
description: Oto is the best way to access digital self directed therapy for people with tinnitus, and at a fraction of the cost of in person treatment. Tinnitus or ringing in the ears affects 1 in 8 people, and before Oto effective therapy was only available via expensive meetings with a specialist.

short_description: Review and sign contracts 10x faster with AI
full_location: São Paulo, State of São Paulo, Brazil

description: Cerebrium is the fastest way to set up data analytics and machine learning without writing any SQL or having a data team. Businesses connect their SaaS tools and within minutes have access to a library of pre-built metrics, dashboards, ML models. Businesses can then create workflows based on the outcomes of metrics, ML outputs and action these back into their existing SaaS tools. We are changing the way businesses operate.

short_description: AI-powered wealth management platform from Indonesia
description: Sribuu is an AI-powered personal financial advisor that has helped >250k Indonesians double their monthly savings in their first month of using the app. We help our users make better money decisions with our wealth management tools and give a personalized saving advice based on their financial habits. We launched in January 2021, and grew by around 50% MoM.

short_description: SaaS helping restaurants improve their margins through cost control.
description:
haddock is a fintech SaaS that helps restaurants improve their margins thanks to real-time cost control. We use Artificial Intelligence and Optical Character Recognition to digitize documents, export all data, and bring it to the restaurant in real-time.
It is as simple as taking a picture of an invoice and uploading it. We also integrate with several different POS, making it even easier. We help discover restaurants’ P&L, margins, price variations, and many more business insights. Thanks to haddock restaurants can control price variations and make better business decisions based on real-time updated data.

short_description: Fashion rental service for content creators
description: Brandazine is an exclusive fashion rental service for creators on Instagram and Youtube. We’ve started in Korea where creators pay a monthly subscription to gain unlimited access to fashion products and the opportunity to sell their content to brands. The company is co-founded by Matt and Keon, who’ve both been in the creator space for over 4 years, as well as Ikhan, whose co-founded a fashion rental company previously.  Brandazine has grown to $80K MRR with 100 brands and 500 creators and have stayed profitable for the past 5 months through positive unit economics.

short_description: Empowering creators, Enabling your business
description: Criya gives creative businesses a one-stop storefront + CRM to entice, convert and manage clients. Criya sets up designers, photographers, makeup artists - with a mobile-ready website, and automates their entire lead capture, payments, contracts, scheduling & communication - In just 5 mins.

short_description: Get instant access to cash before selling your home in Latam.
description:
Philippo is building the first proptech platform in Latam that provides liquidity to home equity.

In Latam, ~40% of homebuyers need to sell their current property in order to afford their new home. Buying and selling at the same time can be overwhelming.

By implementing a Sale and Leaseback transaction, Philippo enables homeowners to access their home equity before selling their property on the market, avoiding price discounts and eliminating the pain of moving twice and/or losing their dream home.

short_description: Access control management app for Latam´s gated communities
active_founders: ['Khaled Alhaj', 'Mitchell Contreras', 'Marwa Hage', 'carlos de la guardia']
about_founders: [{'name': 'carlos de la guardia', 'role': '', 'social_media_links': ['https://twitter.com/carlosdelagj', 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/carlosgj/']}, {'name': 'carlos de la guardia', 'role': '', 'social_media_links': ['https://twitter.com/carlosdelagj', 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/carlosgj/']}, {'name': 'carlos de la guardia', 'role': '', 'social_media_links': ['https://twitter.com/carlosdelagj', 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/carlosgj/']}, {'name': 'carlos de la guardia', 'role': '', 'social_media_links': ['https://twitter.com/carlosdelagj', 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/carlosgj/']}]
description:
There are three key roles among a community:

The security Guard
The resident 
The administrator 


When a visitor tries to access a designated community, the security guard must require an ID previously to allow entry. 

He proceeds to communicate with a specific resident through a intercom which is almost always broken or under repair, delaying the visitor’s entry to the compound 


WE come in, by interconnecting the security guard with the resident and the administrators through an app and a tablet we provide to make all the process of access pretty smooth and easy.


When a visitor comes in, the security guard must only:

Take a picture of its ID, using the tablet, 
Select the apartment, so the resident receives a pop up notification through which they can deny or approve the access. 

Last but not least, An even easier way has been developed by Munily which utilizes QR codes generated through Whatsapp. Which visitors just show and security guards scan to allow entry.

short_description: Brex for D2C Brands and Content Creators in Indonesia
description:
UpBanx is Brex for D2C brands and content creators in Indonesia. We are earning $25k in monthly revenue from serving $6.3m in loans and deposits across 37 customers, from whom we earn $8k per customer per year. We are profitable and growing 60% monthly. There are over 700k D2C brands and content creators in Indonesia. If we serve all of them, that is a $5.6b/year market opportunity.

After graduating from Cambridge, Wafa (CEO) led Shopee's business development team in their first year of operations in Indonesia. For a while, Wafa was also the sole representative for YouTube in Indonesia. During this time Wafa acquired and developed D2C brands and content creators that could become UpBanx's customers. Hendri (COO) is a content creator who has garnered over 1m likes through BisaInvest, his Gen-Z stock investing page. Alif (CTO) built Maqmur, a social commerce app with over 500k downloads on PlayStore.

We've raised $5.5m so far from investors like Y Combinator, Alpha JWC, Oliver Jung, Alto Partners, and lndonesia's biggest influencer Raffi Ahmad who has over 100m followers on social. We have also raised from 6 other Y Combinator founders. We are open to working with more investors that can bring strategic value to our long-term roadmap.

short_description: First Fintech for Teenagers in Indonesia
Embedded finance platform for B2B in LatAm.
description:
At Valari, we are on a mission to democratize access to financial services in LatAm, by allowing any B2B company to launch fintech products and services. 

As former small business owners in Latin America, we experienced first-hand how hard it is for SMBs to access financing or a simple bank account. Banks do not have the infrastructure or technology to serve small businesses. 

With the rising wave of technology companies to serve SMBs, we believe these are better positioned than banks themselves, to offer financial solutions to these small businesses. Valari becomes an enabler of financial products distribution by making it simple for B2B platforms to launch their fintech services.

With our simple APIs, B2B platforms can easily embed a lending product in their platform, or launch cards for their users.

Cancer clinics get 200 million calls for complications each year.  Ankr’s full-stack solution (1) automatically warns + educates patients to prevent side effects, and (2) allows clinics to treat patients faster and bill for services using our telehealth suite. 

Founded by industry experts, Ankr is deployed in 26 clinics in 4 states, facilitating care for 16K+ patients.

short_description: Operations on Autopilot
description: Iron Leap helps operations teams take immediate action on time-sensitive events. For example, financial teams are using us to alert on fraudulent transactions in real time. In other cases, Customer Success teams are using us to automatically message churning customers.

short_description: API for shared embeddable web browsers
description: Hyperbeam is an API that lets multiple users control a shared embeddable web browser. For example, a remote learning company pays us $3,000 per month to use our API to allow their users to play games together on their platform. We are three technical founders from the University of Waterloo, and interned at Facebook, Yahoo, and Lyft. Our technology is battle-tested – We took the infrastructure from a watch party website we previously built and scaled to 150K MAU, and 1M hours streamed per month. We launched 2 months ago and have closed $20K in revenue from 8 companies. Hyperbeam is backed by CapitalX, Pioneer Fund, Y Combinator (W22) and more. https://hyperbeam.dev

short_description: Bug bounty as a Service for AI
description:
Bobidi helps AI companies validate the AI models very fast and improve them 10x more efficiently.  It is critical because AI companies are having hard times predicting the unknown-unknowns and thus how the model will perform in the real world.  

Our underlying magic is that we run a global gamified community that is incentivized to test and find the edge cases that the model missed.  The whole process would be 10x more efficient than the industry norm that takes as long as a couple of months.  

This is the mashup between the community and AI, the areas we (the co-founders) are the experts of, bringing experiences from Facebook and Google & Niantic, respectively.  Both have exited before as CEO (Social Commerce Startup in Korea) and CTO (AR Startup acquired by Niantic), respectively.

short_description: Targeting the Tumor Ecosystem to address cancer drug resistance.
description:
Our compounds disrupt the metabolic and
inflammatory triggers in both cancer and quasi-cancerous
cells in the tumor microenvironment. By impacting multiple cell
types, we are enabling effective, lasting cancer treatments.

Our vision is that we’ll be able to disrupt the pharma industry the way fintech has disrupted banking.

short_description: A marketplace of luxury services for ultra-high net worth individuals
description:
Myria is a private marketplace for off-market goods & services — the options you cannot access by Googling. 

Ultra-high net worth individuals spend $390 billion per year ($1.3 million each) on lifestyle, but they still struggle to find everything they want. Why?

Because the best of any category — homes, boats, restaurant reservations — the best stuff is never listed online. Likewise, the best people don’t need the internet to find a new client or job. 

The best is always off-market.  Myria is the Off-Marketplace. 

Myria helps off-market sellers reach the nicest and wealthiest buyers. In turn, we help the world’s most successful people access the best of everything, give back, and get the most out of life. 

If it’s off-market, it’s on Myria!

short_description: We help online sellers manage a sales business on multiple platforms.
description:
Vendoo is a software that was created to solve the daily pain points of the millions of sellers in the steadily growing reselling industry. Our goal is to save sellers time and help them make more money. The user friendly interface allows sellers to crosspost their items onto multiple marketplaces in a fraction of the time that it takes to do so manually. Users can currently list items onto 10 marketplaces, including eBay, Poshmark, Etsy, Mercari, Facebook Marketplace and more.

The software also provides other conveniences for sellers, like the ability to easily import their existing listings, delisting and relisting items with one click, and inventory management features like easy sorting and searching. Vendoo also provides sellers with business data and analytics to help them make calculated decisions to grow their business.

short_description: Doordash for Africa

Heyfood is building the “Doordash for Africa”.  But unlike Doordash in America, we make a profit on every single delivery, from day 1. 

We are targeting Millennials and Gen Z urban professionals in Africa’s top 70 cities, withing 10 years there will be 140m number of these people, we assume they will want to order food once a week, we make $1 per delivery, this represents a $51B market.

short_description: Digitizing and processing Microtransactions in Africa
description: We process cash-based microtransactions across Africa's informal sector, an example of microtransaction is payment for bus rides today we help over 300k people make this payment.

short_description: Data security for every API and database
description:
JumpWire is a software platform for enforcing data security between APIs, applications and databases. By referencing data schemas, JumpWire labels select properties inside data payloads and transforms the raw data into a protected format, using encryption, tokenization or masking. JumpWire’s approach to securing data in-place minimizes the risk of data leaks exposing sensitive information or mishandling by other applications and vendors. The exact security scheme applied to data is defined by policies that align with an organization’s existing InfoSec program.

JumpWire helps companies who maintain information security with compliance programs such as SOC or HIPAA. They are processing sensitive data, often from their own customers, and exceed security best practices as a competitive advantage. JumpWire provides defense at depth to data and sits alongside access controls and Layer 4 encryption to provide a comprehensive data security solution.

JumpWire is unique from solutions such as data vaults by installing inside our customers’ own infrastructure and clouds. It is interoperable with existing applications and databases, which eliminates the need for large data migrations or code refactoring. Lower-level approaches to data security, such as encryption at rest, are too blunt and lack the ability to differentiate between properties in the data itself. Its scope is limited to physical storage, and security is lost as soon as an application or query loads the data.

short_description: B2B platform connecting restaurants with food suppliers
description: Kaso (formerly Elkaso) is the largest B2B ordering platform for restaurants and suppliers in the Middle East. Kaso connects restaurants and suppliers, to manage and improve the order process end to end to save time, money, and food.

short_description: The marketplace for wood manufacturing
description:
Look around you - everything you see that was made with wood a designer conceived and then a woodworker has made. Most of the time, something went painfully wrong.

60% of the $1.4T global woodworking market is serviced by small businesses with inefficient, manual processes - Cutr is digitising their workflow. This market is massive, chaotic and surprisingly manual. Woodworkers are mostly offline, hard to find and even harder to vet. They need help with critical back-of-house jobs like quoting and capacity planning. Customers have no idea where to find them and need help asking the right questions & providing the right info to get their job produced correctly. 

Cutr solves discovery, pricing, payments and workflow for the woodworking market. 

Our users simply upload a file, accept an instant quote, and get their parts delivered. To make that possible we do the heavy lifting: filechecks, automated quoting, matchmaking, creating job packages, tracking changes & updates, logistics and payments.

Cutr saves time, cuts costs and ensures quality with a smooth workflow.

short_description: Gamified metaverse for live online classes
description:
Koala is an all-in-one platform for online tutors to successfully run their business.


😫 The problem 

For 30 million online tutors worldwide, the #1 pain point is: Students’ Zoom boredom.
Because a bored student is a customer who won’t stay long.

😎 The solution

We built a gamified platform for online tutors to teach kids online.

80,000 classes later, it’s clear that kids love this metaverse and beg their parents for more classes. This translates into higher retention and more business for tutors who use Koala instead of Zoom.

💰 Monetization

With a premium subscription, tutors unlock additional tools to grow their business.
And when parents pay tutors through our platform, we take 5%.

📈 Market

In 2021, parents paid $166B to online tutors.

A startup in exactly our space, Outschool, is worth $3B, 5 years after YC. 


In 10 years, every live online class will happen in Koala.

We're raising a $2M seed with $1M already allocated. If you’re an awesome investor, please contact Xavier at xavier@teachwithkoala.com.

short_description: Killing the login page via instantly authenticated accounts.

short_description: We Rent Your Property by the Room.  You earn 50% more Rent.
description:
Homeroom helps investors provide affordable housing while making a 22% ROI.

We do this by sourcing properties, arranging capital, managing construction, vetting tenants and collecting rent by the room. To date, Homeroom has brought on 85 property investors, growing 6X annually, are bringing in 420K in annualized net-revenue

How it works:
We help investors buy homes in cities that are attractive to young people, but lack affordable housing options.  We then renovate and after about 20 days, the home is ready and we find qualified renters by the room.

We launched in 2018 in Kansas City with 1 home. We now have 105 homes in 31 cities. In 2021, we grew rental GMV to $1.8M (300% YoY growth). Our average rent across every property is $458, which is about 50% lower than market comps, and our investors see returns up to 50% higher.

We are HomeRoom. Johnny is the financial analyst/domain expert. Thomas is a cereal entrepreneur with a PHD in ML, and Mike hacked growth for Airbnb and Facebook.

short_description: Delivering groceries under 15 minutes in Indonesia
description:
Dropezy - delivering groceries in 15 minute in Indonesia. 

Today, our vision is to revolutionize Indonesia's $116Bn grocery landscape by making e-Groceries fast, convenient, affordable and accessible for all through strategically placed dark-stores. We replicate they typical Indonesians offline purchasing behavior by enabling them to purchase daily needs online in smaller quantities, at higher frequencies, 24/7 whilst ensuring operations efficiency.

Midnight cravings? House party but got no beer? Or simply annoyed with the headache of buying daily needs offline? We got you! Simply select products, make payment, and receive it instantly - It's that EaZY #Crazyfast

short_description: Bond trading platform for institutions and asset managers in India
description: Harmoney is a bond trading platform for financial institutions and asset managers in India. We are building the infrastructure to digitize bond markets and make bond trading more efficient.

short_description: Online marketplace for team retreat venues
description: TeamOut is a retreat platform for team managers. We offer easy-to-book venues for team retreats. Managers spend months planning for a retreat. We help them do it in just a few days. How? We offer 20+ bedroom private places with robust Wifi that companies can book in a few clicks. This is an incredibly exciting time to meet with your team again, build memorable experiences that your team will remember forever.

short_description: Skillza teaches kids in the Middle East to code
description:
Skillza teaches Coding, Math and Entrepreneurial skills to 6-16 year olds in Middle East and North Africa. 

The Problem
The quality of education in the Middle East and North African region is in the bottom 7 percentile in the world. High school and univ. grads in the region take 7 years to find gainful employment.
80% of MENA have Arabic as their first language. Yet, there is no local solution for the 120 million kids in the region to learn skills.

The Solution
Live Online Classes to learn coding and other skills

Small group classes (upto 1:4)
Bilingual teachers with industry experience
Arabic Content and Teaching
Activity-Based gamified learning
Local Community of MENA Parents+Kids

short_description: Home diagnostic & subscription program for people with sperm and ovary
description:
Janani is building at-home diagnostic and treatment plans to service 130 Million infertile Indians, starting with at-home semen diagnostic. 
We launched 4 months ago, we already have ~$8000 of monthly revenue, and we’re growing 50% every month.
On average we make $60 per customer, this is an 8 Billion USD market opportunity.

short_description: Play basketball in virtual reality
description: Founded in 2021, Gym Class lets you play basketball with people from all over the world in virtual reality. Get a great workout, make new friends, and compete to become a digital basketball superstar.

short_description: Battery-electric cargo ships.
description: Fleetzero is building battery-electric cargo ships that operate with 5X higher net margins than fossil fuel ships. Our battery technology is the only pathway to decarbonize the $1.3 trillion shipping industry without a green premium.

short_description: Marketplace for convenient outdoor experiences in the wild
description: Pursuit (https://www.pursuitoutside.com/) is a marketplace for urban professionals to find lodging and guided outdoor experiences in amazing natural locations.  We make it easy for people of all skill levels to enjoy authentic outdoor sports together in the wild.

short_description: Storefronts on WhatsApp in Southeast Asia
full_location: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
description:
Yezza makes it easy for small businesses in SE Asia to create storefronts on WhatsApp. Our MRR is $40K with $3M monthly GMV, from 1500 orders every day. We are profitable.

Not only for selling goods & products, Yezza also built features to fit with many use cases in WhatsApp Commerce. For example, social media influencers use Yezza to deal with brands using WhatsApp. We found that customers also make table reservations through WhatsApp.

Merchants pay us $12 per month & up to $0.25 per order. With 50M WhatsApp Business downloads in SE Asia, this creates a $7.2B market opportunity. Interestingly, a similar buying-via-WhatsApp behavior exists in Latin America & Africa.

Previously, we bootstrapped a tech-enabled travel company to $12M in annual revenue, by selling travel packages using WhatsApp. We built & used this product for 4 years in our previous company. During COVID19, we offshoot it to become a standalone business called Yezza.

Yezza is now backed by Y Combinator & angel who worked at Facebook/WhatsApp.

short_description: The machine learning API for non-experts
description: Use Nyckel to train and integrate state of the art machine learning into your application. Our ML platform can be used by anyone and it only takes minutes to train your first model. Once trained, your functions is immediately deployed to production grade infrastructure.

short_description: Smartwatch for employees to improve their physical and mental health
description: NudgeLabs is a smartwatch for employees to improve their physical and mental health. We use the smart watch biometric data to calculate your physical and mental wellbeing and generate personalised, actionable and prescriptive insights.

short_description: Fixing remote collaboration, starting with daily standups
description:
Spinach.io is fixing remote collaboration, starting with daily standups. Our app is integrated with Zoom, Jira and Slack, and runs the meeting for you.

In addition to YC, we’re backed by Zoom, Maven Ventures Tuesday Capital and other great investors.

short_description: Product insights from customer support data
description:
Blaze transforms customer feedback into actionable insights to help product teams make better decisions.

Blaze automatically tags and categorizes customer support issues so teams can more easily identify bugs and prioritize features. Blaze provides a centralized dashboard that joins together support, sales and user data, and offers intuitive templates to make independent data exploration easy for non-technical teams. We uncover trends and flag anomalies to ensure no urgent issue is missed.

short_description: Use personal data for analytics and ML, safely and seamlessly
description:
Sarus solves the problem of accessing or sharing personal data for analytics or machine learning. 
The solution deploys natively in data infrastructures and lets practitioners work on data they cannot see. Every interaction with the sensitive data is protected with the highest privacy standard: differential privacy
Sarus makes traditional anonymization methods irrelevant, saving months in compliance and data engineering while preserving all of the value of data.

short_description: Promotions-enabled mobile POS for cornerstores.
description:
In Indonesia, ~US$100 billion worth of consumer products are channelled through cornerstores (warung) annually. Cornerstores today are primarily cash-based and do not have any systems to run promotions. 

Bipi is a free, easy-to-use POS app for cornerstores in Indonesia. Cornerstores simply scan barcodes to instantly access products & prices, track sales and manage their stores. We facilitate promotions for FMCG brands in our stores, boosting sales by 10-60%. 

Our founding team has worked with large brands like Coca-Cola, Mondelez and AB Inbev, where we learned that brands spend 20% of revenues on promotions, making it a $3B opportunity in Southeast Asia.

short_description: Genomic medical record to manage results for life
description: Nest Genomics is software for health systems that automatically creates personalized care plans for patients who had genetic testing.  For example, if someone is at risk for breast cancer, we provide a personalized plan that includes imaging, referrals to specialists and medication that can help prevent cancer.

short_description: Making 'REAL' Milk without any Cows!
description: Brown Foods is a Stanford, Rice University and IIT Delhi alumni venture building the next-generation of food products. They are creating UnReal Milk- lab based, clean milk - extremely sustainable 'real milk' but made without any cows. Unlike any other option in the USD 22 billion dairy alternatives market today, it will be exactly similar to cow’s milk in terms of nutritional profile, taste, texture and could also be processed into butter, cheese and ice creams. They envision to disrupt the USD 700 billion conventional dairy market by giving the world its 1st 'cow free' real milk option, reducing the carbon footprint of milk by over 90% while being completely cruelty-free.

short_description: Banking as a Service for DeFi
description: A single API for fintechs to embed DeFi products on their platform. This allows them to acquire more customers, retain these customers and increase revenue & engagement, all in a custodial, secure, & compliant way.

short_description: Developing the next-generation of infrastructure projects
description:
Perl Street is democratizing structured finance through our platform, unlocking billions in financing for sustainable infrastructure and next-generation hardware technologies. 

Perl Street has already helped multiple hardware startups receive over $140M in debt financing offers from some of the world’s most reputable institutions.

Climate change is a massive hardware problem. According to IEA estimates - reaching net zero emissions would require over $4 trillion per year in global clean energy investment. 

This means we need to upgrade nearly everything with new hardware - from energy storage devices to electric vehicles, charging stations and building electrification. 

The future of infrastructure is both distributed and resilient. And none of it is possible without financing new hardware.

short_description: Brex for small businesses in Indonesia
Modern financial data infrastructure for fintechs
description:
Proper provides software & APIs to help fintechs manage their payments data across providers. We connect banks, APIs providers, and networks in a single platform and provide tools for reconciliation and payment operations. We help fintechs maintain financial accuracy at scale and expedite the development of their financial infrastructure.

We're building the integrated financial operating system for fintech, so companies can stitch together a winning stack on day 1. With Proper, companies can spend less time on low-level financial data infrastructure and more time focused on building for their end-users.

short_description: The best way to normalize data files
description:
A huge percentage of companies write code to let their users upload files.

Segna is the best way for companies to import files in their product, as we save them from having to write their own file importer. We use ML to clean and normalize files which is more accurate and less brittle than hard-coded string parsing.

short_description: A Digital Experience for Every Celebration
description: Lovecast provides a digital experience for all life's important moments. Imagine a birthday party or a wedding where guests can join from anywhere in the world and send gifts, take group photos, throw virtual rice, and participate in other meaningful ways.

short_description: Advance next payday, and BNPL for bills
description: Wagetap is a mobile app that allows users to get an advance of up to $300 on their next payday and pay their bills in more manageable installments. Wagetap's vision is to offer a suite of financial products to become the financial partner for everyday people.

short_description: Email sending for startups
description: Loops is a simple and beautiful email sending platform for SaaS companies. We have a Notion-style block editor for email creation, a beautiful code editor based on VS Code, and pre-built loops for SaaS companies to snap-in to increase their revenue and user engagement.

short_description: Kayak.com for vacation rentals
description: VacationHomeRents helps users explore and compare vacation rental options across many listing platforms such as Airbnb, VRBO, Booking.com, etc.

short_description: The first neobank for teenagers in the Middle East & North Africa
description: Zywa is the first neobank tailored for teenagers in the Middle East and North Africa. Through Zywa, teens are able to spend, receive and manage money without the need for cash, and they can also get rewards and interact with their friends. Using the app, parents can also send money to their kids, which they can spend securely in the safe environment of their parents’ oversight.

short_description: Promotion management platform
description:
Cherry is the only AI promotion management platform. We help online stores boost revenue and increase their marketing ROI by delivering and tracking dynamic promotions. 

Cherry uses AI to improve the targeting of promotions to new and existing customers in real-time

Cherry has helped its customers increase conversion rates by up to 51%. 

Cherry is lead by an expert founding team. Isaac has a PhD in maths and delivered AI at McKinsey, Rian is an ex-Microsoft software engineer.

short_description: Computational biology tools in the cloud with a line of code
description:
Toolchest makes it easy for bioinformaticians to run popular computational biology software in the cloud. Drug discovery companies use Toolchest to get analysis results up to 100x faster.

We have Python and R libraries that customers use to run popular open-source tools at scale in the cloud. Toolchest is used wherever their analysis currently exists – e.g. a Jupyter notebook on their laptop, an R script on an on-prem cluster, or a Python script in the cloud.

short_description: We screen for cognitive impairment - all from your cellphone!
description:
Our D2C SaaS solution makes it possible to screen for cognitive impairment accessibly, affordably, and accurately. 

Catching cognitive impairment early is essential to helping those with the condition. Unfortunately, early detection today means a PET scan, which is expensive and invasive (especially given everyone above 55 should be screened annually). After our previous academic work ( where we built models that can catch the condition three times as accurately as a doctor and 5-10 years before symptoms appear) we're building a consumer product. All from 10 minutes of gameplay on a computer!

We're building in the $18bn diagnostics space and leveraging our proprietary tech to craft the first bespoke stack in the $300bn cognitive impairment care industry.

short_description: mRNA Immunotherapies to Eliminate Cancer
description: Engage Bio is developing mRNA immunotherapies to eliminate cancer. Our founders have deep experience in immunotherapy development, including four drugs in the clinic, and in building mRNA therapeutics platforms. In the last four months, we have moved from concept to fully working drugs which have eliminated human tumors in mice. We achieve this by delivering mRNA directly to the tumors, providing instructions for these cells to make and gradually release our drugs. This local therapy allows us to completely eliminate the cancer while sparing distant healthy tissues.

short_description: Bringing non-invasive brain stimulation from the hospital to the home
description:
Non-invasive brain stimulation is a widely-utilized, FDA cleared treatment used for patients diagnosed with depression, but is limited to a hospital setting due to the cost of the device, and complexity of treatment application.

Our proprietary brain stimulation device allows patients to be treated directly from their home, with the same efficacy, and at a lower cost of treatment.

Currently in FDA pivotal phase for Major Depressive Disorder, and Pilot phase for Alzheimer's and Parkinson diseases.

short_description: Kiter is the best way to manage opportunities for your next job
description: Kiter allows you to quickly track job applications . Keep track of information on the companies that you are applying to and make the application process fun, fast and effective.

short_description: Full-stack auto insurer for the underserved in LatAm
active_founders: ['León Bartolomé Carreño', 'Andrés Guerrero Álvarez', 'Lois Rogel Vence']
about_founders: [{'name': 'Lois Rogel Vence', 'role': '', 'social_media_links': ['https://www.linkedin.com/in/lois-rogel-vence-54b49090/']}, {'name': 'Lois Rogel Vence', 'role': '', 'social_media_links': ['https://www.linkedin.com/in/lois-rogel-vence-54b49090/']}, {'name': 'Lois Rogel Vence', 'role': '', 'social_media_links': ['https://www.linkedin.com/in/lois-rogel-vence-54b49090/']}]
description:
In Momento we are going through a challenging regulatory process to become a fully-licensed insurance carrier. By doing so, we will be able to underwrite risk, set prices and, ultimately, become owners of the product.

Once approved, around summer 22, we will be in a great position to size the $13bn untapped opportunity of +30 Mn uninsured vehicles – just in Mexico! As we will be able to attack the main pain points in the market: i) antiquated underwriting models and ii) payment conditions only adapted for the affluent.

To succeed, we have assembled an elite team with both innovative and experienced profiles. We are three cofounders, two ex-McKinsey and one ex-P&G, and we managed to attract two heavyweights of the Mexican insurance industry: the previous CUO of Zurich Mexico and the previous CFO and VP of Finance of ING and AXA Mexico.

short_description: AI enabling digital urine diagnostics in the home
description: Starling is building a urine diagnostic remote patient monitoring platform that seamlessly integrates into anyone's bathroom routine.  By detecting early changes in a patient's urine using our toilet indwelling mass spectroscopy device, our platform is aiming to prevent hospitalizations from numerous conditions like recurrent UTIs, BPH exacerbations, or diabetes.
