We do this while creating significant new annual revenues for our clinician partners from remote patient monitoring reimbursements without requiring any significant changes in a staff's day to day schedule.

short_description: AngelList for venture debt
description: 8vdX is the first tech-enabled venture debt marketplace for startups, think of us as AngelList for venture debt. We are a challenger to the old venture debt players. Our mission is to provide founder friendly debt to the startups in YC and be the debt partner to the breakout companies as they scale and raise their Series A, B and beyond. The founders, Ravi Chachra and Vijay Lavhale, worked together at Eight Capital which is a credit platform started by Ravi in 2005. Ravi is a repeat fintech founder, he started Snaz in 1999 - a startup that built a mobile wallet with single click checkout. Vijay has an engineering degree from IIT Delhi and has previously worked at Goldman Sachs.

short_description: Growing micro-organs to find new drugs
description: Rosebud Biosciences accelerates drug development by screening drugs against organoids (micro-organs) that have the same gene mutations as the patients. We partner with therapeutics companies to screen their drugs, and we perform our own drug discovery for rare diseases that have no existing treatments. Our organoids are also fetal-like and enable discovery of novel drug targets for pediatric diseases. This technology was validated at Stanford, published in a prestigious journal, and has already led to the discovery of a drug target in a pediatric heart disease that could not have been found using traditional disease models.

short_description: Wingback provides tools and APIs for SaaS pricing and packaging.
description: Wingback provides tools and APIs for SaaS pricing and packaging. We are infrastructure that allows SaaS startups to deploy any set of features of their product using any pricing model. It enables non-technical teams to implement pricing and packaging changes and execute product-led growth campaigns without engineering involvement.

short_description: Accidental Death Insurance for Surgery
description: Samos sells accidental death insurance for individuals undergoing surgery. Just like travel insurance but covering a hospital stay.

short_description: Fast and secure renovation payments
description:
WeReno helps reduce disputes during renovations by mediating payments through a milestone-based escrow system and by providing both contractors and homeowners with a CRM tool that helps manage projects in a more transparent manner.

The average American renovation contractor sees at least 5% of their payment withheld across 46% of their projects while over 51% of American homeowners report being misled by a contractor, resulting in their project going awry.

Our CRM tool helps create digital project contracts with clear job scopes and payments that are tied to pre-set milestones. By digitizing contracts and payments, we've built a system that significantly reduces disputes as homeowners have a better understanding of timelines and what will be delivered.

short_description: Bill.com for SE Asia
description:
Peakflo enables SMBs and startups to streamline their customer collections and vendor payments. 187 finance team users, from early-stage startups to unicorns in SE Asia, use Peakflo to:
✅Save 100 hours/month on finance ops ⏳
✅Get paid faster on customer invoices by 10-20 days 📈
✅Save 50-90% on vendor payment fees 💰

short_description: Plaid for business data in Latam
description: An API with must-have data for B2B finance providers. We build authorization workflows and secure connections with multiple finance platforms (payment, commerce, tax, accounting). Then, we standardize this data and distribute it through a universal API. Our API enables our clients to increase conversion rates and operate products in structured data instead of pen and paper.

short_description: Payments orchestration and recurring billing platform for LATAM
description:
Rebill saves the card on file and allows the merchants to increase their acceptance rates by linking multiple payment gateways in a single transaction. It offers full flexibility to manage any type of recurring billing scenario and provides advanced metrics for any e-commerce or SaaS company. 

Plus, we have ready-to-use integrations with the leading e-commerce platforms like WooCommerce, Nuvemshop, Shopify, Jumpseller and Prestashop.

Rebill is currently operating in 🇦🇷 Argentina, 🇧🇷 Brazil, 🇨🇱 Chile, 🇨🇴 Colombia, 🇲🇽 Mexico, 🇵🇪 Peru, 🇺🇾 Uruguay.

short_description: Easily deploy scalable, secure applications without any devops
description:
Flightcontrol makes it easy for developers to deploy scalable, secure applications without any devops. We launched 10 weeks ago and have 18 paying customers live in production.

We are growing quickly because Brandon created Blitz.js, an open-source Javascript framework with 11,000 Github Stars, and Flightcontrol is a solution to the problems Blitz users were experiencing. Brandon and Mina both have engineering degrees, and are building Flightcontrol to solve those same problems we personally experienced as consultants.

We discovered AWS is built for low-level developers who want maximum performance and control, and Heroku was built as an easy solution for developers who didn’t need that control. 15 years later, there’s now a large segment of developers who do want maximum performance and control but without the difficulty of AWS.

Flightcontrol solves this by providing a layer on top of AWS that makes it very easy to use and let’s them pop the hood leverage the raw power of AWS. Because of this new approach, users have migrated their production apps to Flightcontrol from Heroku, Render, Vercel, and existing AWS setups they previously spent weeks building.

Investors are Soma Capital, Global Founders Capital, Rebel Fund, Active Capital, and Sovereign Capital. Other investors include Matt Biilmann (Netlify), Doron Sherman (VP of DevRel, Cloudinary), and Randall Kent (Cypress.io).

short_description: LinkedIn app for blue-collar workers in Southeast Asia
description: Lumina is a fast-growing, job community platform for underserved workers in Indonesia. With its highly engaged community, Lumina helps tens of thousands of SMEs recruit quality workers. Amassing hundreds of thousands of engaged job seekers, Lumina aims to revolutionize the blue and grey collar recruitment space where business owners can tap into suitable talents, fast and easy. The platform’s name “Lumina” comes from the word “light” – a testament to the co-founders’ wish to “be the light for underserved workers when all other lights go out”. For more information, visit www.lumina.mba.

short_description: Modernizing Specialty Insurance
description:
PolicyFly empowers insurers to sell and manage specialty insurance in minutes instead of in weeks.

Every year, $200B of specialty insurance like Cyber, Flood or Trucking is processed over email between agents and insurers – PolicyFly connects both parties to automate these workflows and to consolidate all data. 

We bring growth, efficiency and transparency to otherwise hard to insure markets.

short_description: Online therapy platform for LatAm
description: Selia pairs Spanish speakers with certified mental health professionals for video and in-person sessions.

short_description: AI Infrastructure for Video
description: Sieve enables software developers to process and understand video without any AI or infra expertise. We’re like a database that can index video, for any application at any scale.

short_description: Developer tools for multiplayer games and virtual economies.
A stock market for sports.
description:
Railbird is Robinhood for sports trading: an exchange where users can trade shares in sports teams and players. If you think the New York Knicks are undervalued, you can purchase shares on Railbird and hope to profit over time as the price moves up in response to team wins.

Our mission is to bring the innovation and efficiency of the capital markets to the nascent world of sports betting. Our professional backgrounds, from hedge funds to professional sports teams, give us the insights and network necessary to build a robust, fair, and engaging exchange.

We believe Railbird will unlock a new way for sports fans to engage with the games they love, while also allowing financial institutions to invest in an entirely new asset class.

short_description: Data driven neobank for SMBs in LATAM (Brex for LATAM)
description:
Cash management solution that offers debit & credit solutions for SMBs in LATAM (Brex for LATAM). 
- 24/ Multi-treasury: multiple debit accounts, payroll & services payment, wires
- Corporate Expenses: dashboard and prepaid cards to control your employee's budget & expenses
- Credit Card: flexible global line where you can decide to use it as a revolving line or as a simple amortizable credit in installments.

short_description: Virtual Womens health clinic for enterprise:Endometriosis to Menopause
description:
Syrona is an employee benefit solution tackling diversity and Inclusion, for 45% of the workforce that go through women's health events from Endometriosis through to Menopause. We do this though our virtual clinic which provides personalised diagnostic, telemedicine and evidence based self-management tools.

The areas we cover are Endometriosis, PCOS, Fertility, Parenthood, Cancer or Menopause.

short_description: Building the world’s largest online surf gear store.
description: The one stop shop for surfers. Boardcave provides surfers with online surf knowledge and gear to accelerate their surfing. The company is reimagining how surfers progress and partake in ocean activities.

short_description: A virtual getaway while you work 🏞
description:
LifeAt is a website that lets you work while looking at a relaxing video background like a beach in Hawaii or a cafe in Paris. Our 230K Weekly Users use LifeAt all day to transport themselves to somewhere beautiful to focus. 

What started as a weekend side project quickly turned into the way many remote workers get through the day. Our users tell us we help them focus better and feel less lonely with the video content we curate. 

Similar to other high-growth social or productivity startups, LifeAt just hit 101K Instagram followers,182K Tiktok followers, and 74K Discord members (in under 6 months, no marketing and all organic growth).

short_description: Sprayable hydrogel to keep internal organs scar-free after surgery
description: TYBR is developing a hydrogel spray to prevent internal scarring after surgery. The naturally derived material is applied to coat tendons at the end of surgery to improve healing outcomes for the 1.8m Americans who suffer tendon or ligament injuries each year.

short_description: 40-min PCR-quality COVID test at the cost of a rapid antigen test
description: Uh-Oh Labs has built the world's best COVID test: PCR-quality results within 40 minutes at the cost of an antigen test. This is enabled by our patented breakthrough chemistry which drastically reduces costs while maintaining accuracy. We have gone from a clinical trial to point-of-care FDA authorization within 8 months, and the NIH has awarded us $15M in non-dilutive funding to scale our manufacturing. We're building tests right now and shipping to customers in April, and our next milestone is an over-the-counter authorization to allow for inexpensive and accurate COVID testing for schools, workplaces, and homes across the country.

short_description: Private banking for high-earning creators
description: OnScale is business bank for high-earning Creators that automates income budgeting, cash flow management, tax write offs and invoicing. We help creators automate financial tasks, save money and time.

short_description: Plaid for utilities
description: Pelm is building a developer API that allows third parties to access energy data from utilities. Using Pelm, you can query hourly electricity usage or pay bills for a specific property. Instead of building clunky integrations with hundreds of utilities across the U.S., you only need to integrate with one seamless API to start harnessing energy data.

short_description: Detect & Mask Sensitive Personal Data
description:
Strac helps businesses avoid data breaches by securing their most sensitive customer data like  SSN, DL, Passport, Bank Statements, etc. across all communication channels like Office 365, Gmail, Slack, Onedrive, Google Drive, Zendesk and Web Applications.

Strac allows businesses to exchange sensitive PII/PHI data safely without any party touching by default.

short_description: B2B E-commerce & Fintech platform for Pharmacies & Hospitals in Africa
description: Remedial Health sells medicine wholesale to the 1 million pharmacies and hospitals in Africa. Today in Africa, pharmacies shop in open-air medicine markets where they pay higher prices for counterfeits medicines. We offer a managed marketplace with all the stock they'll need, deliver within 24 hours and offer credit to help them grow.

short_description: Plaid for Construction
description: We help construction companies share data between systems and parties with a single API.

short_description: Easily automate all your data work
description: Cube empowers analytics teams to easily automate complex ETL, data science and reporting workflows through a single no-code platform.  We work with large enterprise customers and have been able to improve their data productivity 10X on average.

short_description: Men's health, starting with weight loss.
description: Alfie is the first program for men that combines doctor-prescribed medication, 1:1 health coaching, and community based competition to help you lose 15% of their weight on average.  We're tackling men's health from the lens of men's weight loss because obesity is the single largest risk factor for men's health conditions like prostate disease.

short_description: We Mine Asteroids
description: AstroForge is an asteroid mining company. Instead of bringing back the entire asteroid, we break it up, refine, and return only what’s valuable.

short_description: Stealth Psychedelic Co
description: A Ω

short_description: Open source feature flagging and A/B testing
description:
GrowthBook is an open source platform to help companies make data-driven product decisions with feature flags and A/B tests.  

Existing SaaS solutions like LaunchDarkly require a company to send all of their data to them. This results in high costs, data compliance issues, and vendor lock-in.  As a result, many companies end up building their own platforms in-house, which can take thousands of hours of work and lots of headaches.  To solve this, GrowthBook uses a company's existing data infrastructure and business metrics.

We believe feature flags and experimentation are the right way to build products at scale and that they will become a standard part of the development process.  GrowthBook is well positioned to be a leader in this growing market.

short_description: One-click checkout for LatAm.
full_location: São Paulo, State of São Paulo, Brazil
description: Compra Rápida is the fastest way to checkout in LatAm, leveraging customer experience and conversion rates. We work across all platforms, empowering anyone to collect payments in just one-click.

short_description: US medical expertise for doctors around the world.
description: Mederva Health makes it possible for doctors in developing countries to provide better care for their patients by tapping into the best US medical experts. Doctors abroad use our web app to consult with and learn from our board-certified physicians, like cardiologists and oncologists from Stanford, Harvard, and Johns Hopkins.

short_description: Coinbase Earn for Southeast Asia
description:
We make crypto investing safe and easy for consumer and businesses through DeFi yielding. 

Our product is plain simple. People can deposit and withdraw in 3 clicks. Right after deposit, they might earn competitive interest with no hidden fees. The interest is obtained from DeFi protocols.

We believe that people can reap the benefits of crypto investing, not by trading, but long-term holding. Start your crypto investing journey with Blocknom.

short_description: Stable savings app for East Africans.
description:
Bloom offers students and young professionals in East Africa US Dollar banking. By saving in USD or digital dollars, and spending as they go in local currencies, they won't be subject to inflation.

Problem:
East Africa is home to 500 million people, with a median age of 18, growing at ~3% annually. Favourable demographics and population growth, compounded with GDP growth of ~6 - 8% underpin a fast-growing middle class.

Nonetheless, East African currencies depreciate 15 - 20% per annum on average - this is the biggest impediment to wealth protection and creation for this middle class.

Solution:
We offer the middle class access to high-APY savings in stable currencies and financial services that enable consumers to spend as they go in local currencies. We do this using both banking infrastructure and Web3.

Motivation:
Being from countries with volatile currencies, we have seen family and friends lose large portions of their savings to inflation - this is what fuels our passion about this problem and what motivates us to build Bloom.

short_description: Helping startups grow.
description: Arc is the full-service finance platform for SaaS, providing software startups with the customized financial products they deserve. Founded in 2021, Arc is on a mission to help startups grow by converting future revenue into upfront capital at the click of a button. The company is based in San Francisco and is funded by NFX, Bain Capital Ventures, Clocktower Technology Ventures, Torch Capital, and Y Combinator, among others. To learn more, visit www.arc.tech.

short_description: Canva for programmable video
description: Canva for programmable video—video that can be automatically generated via API.

short_description: At-home lab tests via API
description: We provide everything needed to offer lab-analyzed diagnostic tests using at-home collection kits. Companies simply order tests via our API, and we handle the rest—the collection kits, the logistics, and the lab integrations.

short_description: Yodaa is Savings-First NeoBank for GenZ in India (FinTech+Web3)
description:
With Yodaa, our customers get access to a prepaid card and a Smart Money App. Using Yodaa- they can make payments, save money, split bills, get credit, invest, and learn about wealth Creation. The customers can also round off their transactions and auto-invest into digital gold. Essentially allowing them to save as they spend.

Our larger mission is to create a “Bank for Life” for 25 million GenZ in India and SeAsia.

short_description: Fullstack treatment for people with lifelong chronic skin conditions
description:
ITCHY is the fullstack treatment service for the 6% of the population suffering from lifelong skin conditions; Psoriasis and Eczema. We connect them to treatments and specialists in 12 hours, treating them with our proprietary line of cosmetic and RX grade products.

Through our VIMPRO platform we treat people over time tracking their skin progress, with our providers setting clear treatment timelines and checkpoints.

short_description: Family of Fintech Brands built on a shared stack
description:
We are building "Thrasio" for fintech. We use our shared engineering, compliance and growth playbooks to build and scale fintech brands that help Americans spend, save, invest and protect each other.   

We take a brand concept from idea to live in 4 weeks through our shared fintech stack.

One Infra, Multiple Brands, Shared Playbooks.

short_description: Opt out software that removes your private info from the internet
description:
Optery makes sure your home address, phone number, email addresses and other private information are removed from the internet.  We do this using our automated opt out software to opt you out of the top data brokers that trade in this information and post it online.  We cover over 200+ web sites and data brokers, more than any other personal information removal service on the market.  Optery prevents identity theft and fraud, reduces the surface area of attack for phishing attempts and spam, and prevents people's private information from showing up in Google search results.  Optery's mission is to put consumers in control of their personal data.

Anyone can create a free account to receive a personalized Exposure Report summarizing where your information is openly posted and sold online.  Optery then provides free tools to remove the profiles on your own self-service, or you can upgrade to a paid plan, and we’ll remove the profiles for you.

short_description: High-res hyperspectral pictures of Earth from space
description: Wyvern is a space data company that will capture the highest resolution hyperspectral images from satellites that cost 100X less than satellites using traditional telescopes.

short_description: Search for the next generation
description: Andi is search for the next generation. It's better than Google for two reasons. 1. It's immune to spam, and 2. instead of a list of blue links, Andi gives you answers. Andi is a huge tech break-through that has only just become possible. It works using large language models like GPT-3 with live online content, combined with reasoning and common sense. Our users are passionate about us, and say Andi works like magic.

short_description: Learning platform for job seekers with job applications automation
description:
Careerist is an online learning platform that trains tech job seekers and automates their job applications with Robotic Process Automation, leading to faster and higher placement. It features live and self-paced training via adaptive-learning software and partnerships with third-party tutors who teach on Careerist's infrastructure.

Techcrunch: "Edtech meets SaaS in Careerist’s job placement learning platform. The startup trains job seekers through live and self-paced training taught by third-party tutors. The adaptive learning software is meant to help candidates prep for tech interviews. Once a candidate is well equipped, Careerist uses automation to help them apply for jobs. The startup doesn’t require tuition until candidates are placed."

short_description: Last-mile distribution marketplace for informal retailers in Africa
description: HQ in Namibia, and expanding in Southern Africa, JABU helps shops and bars place orders digitally to stock up their shop, and JABU fulfills the demand on the same-day through tech-enabled warehousing, last mile distribution and payment collection. On the FMCG side, JABU is empowering brands managers with live dashboards where they interact with the new frontier of retail. Now launching a wallet, merchant services for banks and merchandising services for brands.

short_description: Surgical robotics for every operating room
description:
Revolve is building the world’s only surgical robot designed for every operating room. Its simple yet powerful design makes it the only robot that can service the 1M+ abdominal surgeries performed outside of hospitals in the US every year.

The founders met at the top surgical robotics lab in the country where they worked on next-generation surgical tools for the da Vinci Surgical System. Collectively, they’ve worked on medical robots for applications in general surgery, ENT, urology, dentistry and neurosurgery; medical imaging AI (ex-Swift Medical); rehabilitation devices, surgical instruments for pediatrics; the Ford GT; and a lunar rover.

Revolve’s surgical robotics platform has been developed in collaboration with over 50 surgeons, resulting in a system that is just 1% of the size and cost of competitor devices. The robot has been validated through animal testing, and the company has secured LOIs from Buffalo General Hospital and Pearl Women’s Center.

short_description: Solutions for incontinence
description:
Liv Labs is a US-based consumer healthtech company making solutions for incontinence. 
27 million American women worry about leaking pee in public: a $7B market. Liv Labs is developing a simple medical device to keep them dry at the gym and adaptive exercise software to restore natural continence. Device inventor, Carly Price, reimagined the humble pillow for Casper and now leads the Silicon Valley Design Lab for Ford. Company CEO, Melody Roberts, incubated digital service experiences now scaling globally at McDonald’s and Panera. We’ve raised over $2.5M to date. This total includes a $256K Phase 1 Digital Health grant from the NSF and a $1.67M Direct Phase II SBIR grant from the NIH, based on stellar effectiveness data and user feedback like, “With this, surgery is off the table.” Our FDA-reviewed clinical trial starts soon at Northwestern University.

short_description: Your Digital Merchandising
description: AI SaaS that helps FMCG brands to cut labour costs, boost on-shelf availability of their SKU through Image Recognition.

short_description: On-demand  auto maintenance & repairs
description:
It is cumbersome to maintain/repair vehicles in Africa. Vehicle owners currently have 2 options to choose from; very expensive and geographically limited branded mechanic garages (less than 1% of the supply pool) or unvetted roadside mechanics (about 99% of the supply pool). 

About 95% of vehicle owners cannot afford branded garages where quality and reliable service delivery can be guaranteed and thus rely on roadside mechanics. However, low quality and transparency are typical issues associated with roadside mechanics. 

We created a network of vetted mechanics, spare part vendors and an app that enables easy booking, payment and mechanic matching process. Via the mecho app, a customer or business can make a request for any automobile service (repairs or regular servicing) or part.

short_description: Create, Collect and Sell NFT-Books
description:
Through Odiggo platform writers can create and sell NFT-Books by creating limited edition books and also this will enable book collectors/readers to buy limited edition books from their favorite writers. 
Simply imagine that "you can buy a piece of Einstein's research ".

short_description: Workflows for repetitive customer-facing tasks
description: Beau is a no-code tool for businesses to onboard and automate interactions with their clients. Customers use our software to collect submissions, payments, send messages and more.

short_description: Recurring payments for B2C companies on Latam
description: Toku helps B2C companies increase their monthly revenue collection rate so they can focus on the their main business. Payment method management, failed payment retries, payment reminders, failed payment notifications, among others.

short_description: The best live chat software on the planet.  We help you build…
description:
Olark is easy-to-use live chat software that lets you talk to customers on your website. 

Olark can help you track leads, drive sales, increase conversions, and provide great customer service. Real-time visitor information like login name, geographic location, purchase history and cart contents help you personalize every interaction and strengthen customer relationships. 

Sign up and start making your customers happier today!

Click here to sign up for a demo:
https://hello.olark.com/sales

short_description: Searching the internet with large language models
description: We're building a new search engine over the internet using techniques inspired by large language models. Self-supervised learning is a paradigm that will produce radically new capabilities in many areas of tech. We're applying it to search, and in doing so, we hope to make sorting through the huge amount of information on the internet as easy as if you were calling up a memory.

short_description: Attendance tracking for Public Schools and Universities
description:
Safer Management sells attendance software to public school districts and colleges. Public schools receive federal funding based on their average daily attendance, and our software ensures they get the money they need.

We started Safer Mgmt. 12 months ago after I dropped off my twin boys and experienced inefficiencies with the sign-in process. We are now in 75 public schools and two colleges with annual reoccurring revenue of $621,000. We have 82% margins and are profitable. At scale, we will charge $15 per student per year. 

There are 70 million public school students in America which is a $1.4 billion dollar market opportunity.

short_description: Quickbooks for SMBs in Latam
active_founders: ['Joaquín Brenner', 'Antonio Correa', 'François Gueneau de Mussy', 'Felipe Urzúa']
description: Chipax handles all payments, invoices, and reconciliations to provide real-time AR & AP for SMBs, starting in Mexico and Chile. We're currently at $1.6M ARR with more than 1,100 paying businesses. The company is founded by Antonio Correa, François Gueneau de Mussy, Joaquín Brenner, and Felipe Urzúa, Engineers from top universities in Chile, who have all experienced the pain of managing SMBs finances first hand in their previous jobs.

short_description: Offers insurance to customers in a convenient & transparent way
description: Amenli is the first licensed online insurance broker in Egypt. Egypt has one of the lowest insurance penetrations in the world with a 100m population and a $2B GWP market growing 20+% YoY and a potential TAM of $10B. Over the past few months, Amenli issued 500+ policies in less than 10 mins compared to the minimum of 3 weeks industry standard. Amenli co-founders, Shady & Adham were founding team members of Paymob, one of the fastest growing payment companies in MENA. Shady was CCO and Adham was its Tech Lead and they worked together for more than 3 years to scale-up Paymob from scratch to 50K+ merchants, 5 countries and dozens of millions of monthly transactions.

short_description: Enabling brands in LatAm to sell direct and deliver in under 30min.
description:
PideDirecto is a branded digital ordering and delivery solution for local buisness in Latam. We build out their direct-to-consumer sales channels and enable them to deliver their products in under 30 minutes. 

We empower local buisness such as restaurants, pharmacies, local grocery stores, flower shops, clothing stores, cake shops and many more by building out their own branded website, integrating phone and social media orders and helping them deliver their products in less than 30 minutes. While also providing our partners key customer insights and marketing support. 

All for a reasonable fixed monthly fee, without eating up margins with hefty commissions and service charges.

short_description: Help ML teams label the right data
description: When ML teams send their data to companies like Scale.ai for labeling, most can only afford to label 1% or less of their datasets.  But today they don’t have a good way to pick which 1% to label. We help them pick the best 1% of their data to label.  By labeling the most representative data, they significantly improve model accuracy at the same cost.

short_description: The easiest way for any business to offer delivery
description: Nash makes it easy for businesses to offer same-day delivery. We do this by building business workflows on top of delivery APIs (like Doordash, Uber, Skipcart). For example, a local dry-cleaning business can start offering pickup and dropoff service at a customer’s desired time without operating their own fleet.

short_description: Truepill for prescription medical devices
description: Equipt Health makes it easy for any company to offer prescription medical devices to their users. Companies can place orders for equipment and supplies, and as a licensed durable medical equipment (DME) supplier, we handle the rest: the manufacturer relationships, the packaging, the logistics, the clinical (via our provider network) and technical support, and the return of data from connected devices.

short_description: A mobile app. It allows employees to get paid their salary on-demand.
description: A mobile app. It allows employees to get paid whenever they want, instead of just once a month (or biweekly). We sell it to companies as an employee benefit (B2B SaaS).

short_description: Robots that build solar farms
description:
Charge Robotics is building robots that automate the most labor-intensive parts of solar construction.

Solar has rapidly become the cheapest form of power generation in many regions. Demand has skyrocketed, and now the primary barrier to getting it installed is labor logistics and bandwidth.

Our robots remove the labor bottleneck, allowing construction companies to meet the rising demand for solar, and enabling the world to switch to renewables faster.

short_description: Podium for local businesses in Latam
full_location: São Paulo, State of São Paulo, Brazil
description: Ahazou is a SaaS app that helps offline local businesses to connect online with their customers to promote their brand, to build their reputation and to sell more. We've reached USD100k MRR with 16k+ subscribers. Our vision is to build the next all-in-one platform for 50 million local businesses to grow online in Latam. The company is founded by Rui Miadaira - 10+ years building local businesses, 3x entrepreneur, tech background with a Harvard MBA - and has built a team from iFood, Movile, PicPay. Ahazou is backed by GFC, Monashees, Y Combinator (S21) and more.

short_description: Instacart in Indonesia and Southeast Asia
description: Local market is a traditional wet market that consist with 200 - 1000 merchants who sell groceries located in every residential area. We  digitize all these merchants into our apps and provide personal shoppers. So every household can buy groceries from multiple merchants at one local market in one single order. There are 16.000 local markets in Indonesia with 8.000.000 merchants inside.

short_description: We visually monitor space objects for governments and defense
description: HEO Robotics visually monitors satellites for governments and defence. We do this by transforming existing Earth observation satellites with software to image other satellites as they fly close by.

short_description: Moving Things Around in Space
description: Turion Space is building spacecraft to remove orbital debris and provide services to existing satellites.  Our spacecraft will rendezvous and dock with current satellites and large debris objects using vision sensors and robotic arms.  Utilizing the onboard propulsion system, the spacecraft will either deorbit or change the orbit of the debris object or satellite. Our team has a proven track record of bringing ideas to orbit with over 25 years of experience from SpaceX, Skunk Works, and Electroimpact.  Solving this problem is crucial to ensure a sustainable space economy, and is the first step towards our longer term vision of mining Asteroids.

short_description: Online Training for Healthcare Jobs
description: Stepful trains people with a high school education in 4 months and places them into healthcare jobs. Healthcare is the fastest growing industry in the US accounting for 40% of all jobs added including medical assistants, nursing assistants, and phlebotomists.

short_description: Easy accounting for e-commerce
description: Synder is an easy accounting platform focused on e-commerce.  It connects all sales platforms (like Shopify, Stripe, Amazon or Etsy) into one ecosystem, providing businesses with consolidated cash flow, automated accounting, and inventory management making Synder a single source of truth of the correct analytics, accounting and tax filing.

short_description: Audio career advice
description: Quest is a Q&A app where experts answer questions in short audio clips. We’re starting with career advice, hosting founders and operators from YC and companies like Google, who share intimate and personal stories about work you've never heard before.

short_description: Personalize your Hybrid Experience
description: Café offers new ways to schedule real-life interactions and empowers teams to collaborate and socialize.

short_description: Datlo helps companies increase sales and expand through data
full_location: Maringá - Floriano, Maringá - State of Paraná, Brazil
description: Datlo is a geointelligence platform made for sales and marketing folks. In seconds you can conduct market research, find new customers, and distribute channels for your company. All of that without needing a data scientist or a programmer.

short_description: Operating system for reselling online
description: OneShop is building an operating system for reselling online, designed for small sellers. For $45/mo we make it easier to run your reselling business, whether you’re selling on one site or half a dozen. We do this by arming you with tools for your reselling workflow that simplify, standardize, and automate the seller experience across sites and off-platform.

short_description: Connecting Industry and Academia
description: FirstIgnite connects companies with the global academic research market.

short_description: Google-level engineering productivity suite
description:
MergeQueue is a developer tool that automates merge workflows and keeps builds healthy. Engineers save up to 5 hours a week and avoid frustration of broken builds.

Our users include Slack, Bosch, Lightspeed, Fast Checkout and many others. For instance, Slack went from 180 master-build failures per quarter to just 1 build failure when they started using MergeQueue.

Our goal is to become the leading brand for developer experience.

short_description: CRISPR powered Diagnostics with results in < 5mins
description: There are over 70 million low accuracy tests done in US every year for conditions like the flu. Labsimply is using novel CRISPR enzymes to replace these with Point-of-care tests that offer PCR accuracy in 5 minutes or less.

short_description: Marketplace that matches talent to a company's needs.
description:
Talentdrop is turning recruiting into an open marketplace, where hiring companies post bounties for their open roles and any recruiter or other professional can collect it by referring a successful candidate. Companies get more people working on their hiring problem without having to pay more for it, and now anyone can earn big recruiting bonuses previously limited to a few firms.

Professional recruiters can now monetize the excess candidate inventory created from their primary business. This is work they've already done but previously couldn't benefit from. Likewise, candidates won't have to start the vetting process over from scratch again and again since they'll be able to be referred with context and get warm intros into hot hiring companies that can be hard to access. Companies can also share candidates in a more efficient way (for example, Company A has two great product candidates but only one headcount - they can refer the second).

Machine learning will help us make better hiring recommendations faster.

short_description: Vanguard of India for Effortless Investing
description: Stack helps users to save for their life goals like retirement, marriage, education through low fees and globally diversified ETF portfolios in an effortless and automated manner. Savings can be set on autopilot by setting personalised rules such as 'round up' on transactions or 'set & forget'.  Stack also helps the users to earn passive income as they spend through Stock reward on the Stack Card.

short_description: We are the marketplace for trading gaming skins & assets without scams
active_founders: ['Rasmus Andersen', 'Morten Byskov', 'Peter Haldbæk', 'Mathias Hermansen', 'Martin Lykke Suhr']
about_founders: [{'name': 'Martin Lykke Suhr', 'role': '', 'social_media_links': ['https://www.linkedin.com/in/martingeorgesuhrmadsen/']}, {'name': 'Martin Lykke Suhr', 'role': '', 'social_media_links': ['https://www.linkedin.com/in/martingeorgesuhrmadsen/']}, {'name': 'Martin Lykke Suhr', 'role': '', 'social_media_links': ['https://www.linkedin.com/in/martingeorgesuhrmadsen/']}, {'name': 'Martin Lykke Suhr', 'role': '', 'social_media_links': ['https://www.linkedin.com/in/martingeorgesuhrmadsen/']}, {'name': 'Martin Lykke Suhr', 'role': '', 'social_media_links': ['https://www.linkedin.com/in/martingeorgesuhrmadsen/']}]
description:
GamerPay is a marketplace for trading gaming skins and assets without scams. We do this by integrating with games to instantly validate all trades.

We launched 3 months ago and transacted 245.000 dollars growing 30% MoM. 

Talking to 5.000 gamers we learned that 46% have been scammed more than once. Over half are minors, who are stuck trading for cash on social media due to their age. 

We are the first to build a fully compliant system for parental consent, enabling the majority of gamers to trade legally and giving the parents peace of mind.

There are 215 million trades annually in games we support. We make 7 dollars on average per trade. So a $1.5B initial market, growing fast alongside gaming and blockchain game economies.   

The team behind previously co-founded the largest transactional marketplace for secondhand high end clothes in Denmark, with 1 million users and a yearly transacted GMV north of $40 million.

short_description: B2B SaaS for telecom companies to find new sites for towers & antennae
description: Sitenna provides software that helps telecom companies find new locations to put up towers and antennae. It currently takes >24m to deploy a site and this is getting much worse as 5G requires x6-10 more sites than are deployed today. We bring the market together and speed up the process to 6 months, reducing costs for everyone. The team is led by a group of industry veterans with C-Suite level access to telecom companies worldwide.

short_description: Business intelligence for modern data teams
description:
Evidence is a web framework that's designed for data analysts. It's a modern alternative to drag-and-drop BI tools and Jupyter notebooks. 

Evidence enables data analysts to build automated reports, analysis and tools that feel like they came from the graphics department at a top-tier publication. All with skills that they already have.

short_description: We help Latam companies recover lost revenue from chargebacks
description: Protego helps companies recover lost revenue from chargebacks. The company automates chargeback management and dispute processes. It provides real-time monitoring, reporting, and analytics on chargeback information for providing valuable insights into fraudulent consumer behavior.

short_description: We build medical devices to stop the side effects of cancer treatment.
description: Luminate Medical is developing a medical device that helps cancer patients prevent chemotherapy induced hair loss in a comfortable and portable way. Over 1.1M US patients receive chemotherapy treatments causing hair loss each year, creating a $1.7B market in the US alone. To date, we've used our novel compression therapy to prevent hair loss in a 120 animal study, and completed a clinical study showing our device works with healthy volunteers. Our team includes a Thiel Fellow, and a Biomedical Electronic Engineering PhD who has led clinical trials for breast cancer patients.

short_description: Live video signing for real-time agreements
description:
Pactima is a value-centric, fast-growing, and venture-backed company that’s transforming the manner in which businesses conduct transactions in our remote world.

Our flagship product, Live eSignatures<sup>TM</sup>, is a real-time solution that allows people to view and sign documents while simultaneously hosting a secured video call. This easy-to-use solution allows transactions that could only be done in-person to now be performed online.

short_description: Deep Learning for Enzyme Engineering
description: Our product is a software platform that makes it really easy for industrial biotechnology companies to interface with machine learning models for enzyme engineering. Enzymes power most chemical reactions in nature but usually need engineering to work at industrial scale. Our models can be used to suggest high performing sequences that would have typically taken months of wet lab work to identify.

short_description: Driving dental clinic revenue by finding more cavities
description:
Adra is a software that helps dental clinics find cavities and other problems in x-rays faster and more accurately so they can book more procedures and increase their revenue. We started our pilot with 20 dentists 2 months ago and have already increased their clinic revenue by 12%. 
Adra is founded by a dentist and clinic owner, a machine learning expert, and a bioscientist.
When every dentist uses Adra, they will bill patients an extra $52B per year. We will capture a quarter of that, making our addressable market $13B.
https://www.adra.ai/

short_description: A video subscription platform serving black viewers and creators.
description: BlackOakTV is a subscription video platform hyper-serving black viewers and creators. We make it easy for black viewers to find, watch and engage with the content and creators that most reflect their lives and experiences.

short_description: Enabling developers to build internal workflows 10x faster.
description: Tantl makes it easy for developers to build internal workflows, such as allowing customer support reps to quickly process refunds. We do this by providing a low code api that handles 90% of the work.

short_description: Never overpay online
description:
Spoken is a website where users compare buying options for the exact same product across multiple stores. We help our users never overpay online. Spoken has over 100,000 monthly active users.

Dane is a two-time technical YC founder, and he sold his previous company, Parklet, to Greenhouse where he was VP of Platform for 4.5 years. Geoff is a Stanford MBA grad and sold his previous company Cabrio Taxi in 2021. We are backed by Y Combinator. 

http://www.spoken.io

short_description: APIs for parental consent and age verification
description:
StandardCode makes it easy for companies to comply with child data privacy laws such as COPPA and GDPR-K. We do this by making APIs to automate online ID and age verification for children.

Book a demo: https://calendly.com/anaskar/30min

short_description: Regulating the immune system to block cancer & autoimmune diseases
description: SFA Therapeutics is creating therapeutically-tailored oral drugs that regulate the immune system from bacterial metabolites; with a focus on autoimmune diseases and cancers that originate from chronic inflammation. There are over 100 million patients who suffer from autoimmune diseases. Our treatment is designed to block the root cause of many of these chronic inflammatory diseases, with a safe oral drug.

short_description: Make programming multiplayer
description: Codex is a devtool and local first solution that enables just-in-time documentation for deep collaboration wherever you work. From your IDE, like VSCode, to our desktop app. When you’re working and think “what the #$@%!? does this code block do?” Codex let’s you request context with a button click. It then determines the best person to respond and stores their answer for other team members to access later, all automatically and directly on the code block.

short_description: Actionable Insights for sales teams to close more deals
description: Saay is an app that provides actionable insights for sales teams to close up to 40% more deals. We do this by monitoring apps like Salesforce & Hubspot, and tell them like when, how and who to follow up with using Machine Learning.

short_description: The knowledge base that scales with your team
description:
Meetings, docs, wikis, conversations... 
Mindmesh is the knowledge base that works with your existing tools: write bite-size documentation on the fly, backup what would otherwise be lost in Slack, and search for the knowledge scattered across Drive, Notion, Intercom, Zendesk and many more.

short_description: Stripe for healthcare
description: Opkit (YC S21) is building a developer platform for healthcare payments, starting with a modern API for health insurance. Our API product allows developers to submit health insurance claims in ten minutes with fewer than ten lines of code. This is 10x better than competing solutions, including legacy clearinghouses. Opkit was founded in June 2021 by Sherwood Callaway and Justin Ko, both early engineers from Brex, the $12b financial technology startup.

short_description: Modern Recruiting CRM
description:
Instead of waiting for candidates to apply, companies use Crew to pro-actively contact, nurture & close talent, at scale. 
The 1st all-in-one recruiting CRM that lets teams automate their outbound efforts, streamline the hiring processes, and gather all the data in one place.

short_description: Inclusive mental healthcare for companies
description: Therify is an inclusive mental health benefit for companies. Through our web platform, employees access culturally responsive therapists, live community sessions, and self-guided content to support their emotional well-being.

short_description: Growing seaweed to stabilize the climate.
Subscriptions for local shops
description: Shopscribe enables the 1.3M local shops in Europe – like bakeries and nail salons – to offer subscriptions for their products and unlock guaranteed recurring revenue.

short_description: Launch targeted ads from your phone in seconds
description: Plai is the advertising tool built for the 50million+ microbusinesses and creators. The platform lets them launch targeted ads from their phone in seconds, with no experience required. Instead of spending hundreds of hours learning Google Ads, TikTok Ads or spending a lot of money hiring an expensive agency, creators and micropreneurs can use Plai to launch their campaigns. Plai lets creators simply plug in their creative and budget, and Plai runs their advertising campaign using the best strategies from Google and Facebook.

short_description: Operating system for restaurants, focusing on Southeast Asia
about_founders: [{'name': 'Yi Sung (Sung) Yong', 'role': '', 'social_media_links': ['https://www.linkedin.com/in/yongyisung/']}, {'name': 'Yi Sung (Sung) Yong', 'role': '', 'social_media_links': ['https://www.linkedin.com/in/yongyisung/']}, {'name': 'Yi Sung (Sung) Yong', 'role': '', 'social_media_links': ['https://www.linkedin.com/in/yongyisung/']}]
description: Atlas is building the operating system for restaurants. Atlas is the easiest way to start, run and grow any restaurant online and offline. We are the team that previously built Grain, a venture-backed online restaurant, to millions in revenue. Team and investors are from Grain, Accenture, Microsoft, Udacity, McKinsey, Salesforce, Y Combinator and others. https://atlas.kitchen

short_description: Dynamic single-cell analysis
description:
CellChorus is a life science company that applies AI/ML to “watch” and evaluate 1000s of videos of cell-cell interactions so scientists can develop and deliver better cell therapies, antibody therapeutics and vaccines. 

Our platform allows us to evaluate thousands of mini-microscopy experiments in parallel and quantify movement, contact, killing, survival and other activities of single cells and cell-cell interactions. 

Our customers include top-25 biopharma companies developing cell therapies, antibody therapeutics and vaccines (including one of the few companies with an approved CAR T cell therapy) across oncology, infectious diseases and auto-immune disorders.

short_description: Extending human healthspan
description: Output Biosciences is the world’s first preventative therapeutics company that extends human healthspan by combating chronic disease.

short_description: Carbon procurement platform for high quality offsetting
description:
Abatable is the robo-advisor for high quality carbon offsetting. We help companies offset their hard to abate emissions through diversified portfolios of trusted carbon offsets which we source, evaluate and finance. Our team has the right founder-product fit to tackle this problem and have been close friends for over 10 years. Maria was previously VP at Goldman Sachs, where she worked with large companies on forestry investments and carbon procurement, and Valerio was a Product Manager at Monzo, Google and Facebook. 
We are targeting a $5B annual market opportunity from asset managers with existing net zero commitments as our initial customer segment.

short_description: The No-Code Security Automation platform for small-medium businesses.
description:
ContraForce is delivering the new No-Code Security Automation platform for small-medium businesses. 

Our no-code approach allows customers to deploy an enterprise grade SecOps platform that dynamically updates detection and response capabilities through an AI-driven approach. Allowing customers to collapse the time it takes for detection, containment, and response to threats, minimizing the security and scope of impact.

Customers are guided by the platform to the appropriate security controls they need and are able to deploy them in minutes through simple to deploy workflows. Security and compliance can now be accessible to the businesses that need it the most.

short_description: Build Interactive Product Demo in 10 mins for SaaS companies
description: Storylane enables marketing and sales teams to create and share interactive product demos in 10 min. Prospective buyers can self-experience the demos without talking to sales. Our no-code platform allows teams (without any engineering help) to capture, personalize, add guides and publish a demo. These Demos can be embedded on websites, email campaigns or sales followups.

short_description: Automated phone ordering system for restaurants
description:
StrideQ (formerly SliceQ) is the automated phone ordering system for restaurants which ensures no missed calls and no missed orders. Surprisingly, 33% of restaurant customers still prefer ordering via phone calls, but front desk staff is often busy and revenue is lost.

After enabling StrideQ our customers have increased their sales by over 10%, even while dealing with staff shortages in covid times.

Phone ordering is our wedge to become the point of sale system for all restaurants. StrideQ also streamlines dine-in and online orders in one single system. It helps to run restaurants more easily by effectively managing operations during weekend peak rush.

short_description: Byte kitchen brings America's best restaurants to your neighbourhood
description: Byte is able to quickly expand the geographic footprint of any given brand with minimal up front investment by licensing their IP, and rolling out their cuisine across a network of next generation kitchens optimized for delivery, pick up, and take out.

short_description: Delightful components for iOS.
description:
Moving Parts is a library of components for iOS. Everything your designers and engineers are building that isn’t unique to your app, we can do better and cheaper.

We're building high-level SwiftUI components that plug right into your application, made to solve real-world problems when designing and building a native mobile app.

Our components are also highly styleable and take care of responsiveness, localization, accessibility, and follow all platform best practices around dark mode, dynamic font size etc.

short_description: Groceries fresher than a farmer’s market, delivered to you (EU)
description: Membo is a next-day grocery delivery app for premium customers in Europe. Like PinDuoDuo Groceries in China, Membo is the fastest way to order your weekly groceries directly from local food producers. The convenience of supermarkets & 15-minute grocery apps comes at the expense of freshness: food that should be delivered fresh, gets bought in bulk and sits on warehouse shelves for days. To get the freshest produce, you need quick producer-to-end-customer delivery, not just quick warehouse-to-customer delivery. Membo lets you order food directly from hundreds of local food producers & organises delivery so you always get the freshest version of every product. Membo's CEO, Vahur Hansen, was an early engineer at TransferWise, and co-founder, Paula Kink, built her own healthtech startup. Launched in Dec 2020, we've grown 30% MoM for the past 8 months and have delivered over 4000 orders in Tallinn, Estonia.

short_description: Square for Europe
active_founders: ['Maurits Franken', 'Dorus van den Oord', 'Sven van der Zee']
about_founders: [{'name': 'Sven van der Zee', 'role': '', 'social_media_links': ['https://twitter.com/svenvd_zee', 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/svenvdz']}, {'name': 'Sven van der Zee', 'role': '', 'social_media_links': ['https://twitter.com/svenvd_zee', 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/svenvdz']}, {'name': 'Sven van der Zee', 'role': '', 'social_media_links': ['https://twitter.com/svenvd_zee', 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/svenvdz']}]
description:
Orderli is tableside ordering for bars and pubs in Europe. Orderli works without downloading an app, guests can scan a QR code on the table, browser the menu and order what they want. 

For the staff we provide a simple app which gives them a better overview who is ordering and control of the orders that are sent to the kitchen.

In the backend we use predictions to recommend restaurant owners what to purchase and make changes to the menu in real-time.

short_description: Where small grocery stores in Africa buy inventory
description:
Suplias is a B2B marketplace where mom and pop stores in Africa buy inventory directly from manufacturers using a mobile app
We have launched in Nigeria, where we have been growing by 40% monthly for the last 12 months
Our founding team has a combined 25+ years of experience in supply chain and ecommerce having worked for Procter & Gamble, Pepsi Co, Gap and Jumia, the #1 ecommerce company in Africa.

short_description: Abhi is Pakistan's 1st financial wellness platform focusing on…
description: An early wage access platform allowing salaried employees to draw down a percentage of their accrued salary before the next payroll cycle. Helping employees to avoid late payment fee on bills, access emergency cash and substitute expensive debt. We work on a B2B2C model allowing companies to extend the product as a benefits program to their employee base.

short_description: Learning app for school students in Southeast Asia
full_location: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
description:
💡 What is Pandai?

Pandai is an app that helps students get better grades in school. 

Pandai provides gamified quizzes aligned to a specific school curriculum, from which students can learn, practice, get feedback, and diagnose their weaknesses.

🔥 Why do we build this? 

In Southeast Asia, the education system is competitive and exam-oriented. 

There is a huge demand for interventions (tutors, workbooks, and extra classes) to help students perform better in school. Pandai fills the demand with a solution that is better than the alternatives.

👨‍🏫 Who We Are

The three founders are based in Malaysia and have known each other since high school, 23 years ago. 

After we graduated (from MIT & other US colleges), we started our first education company in 2007, focusing on coaching school students in STEM subjects.

We worked closely with students (many of them from underprivileged backgrounds) and saw firsthand the impact we’ve had on them. 

We then realized that with technology, we could reach more students and bring more impact. Hence, we released Pandai in 2020. 

🚀 Present & Future

Currently, we have launched in our home ground Malaysia in 2020. 

So far, 280,000 students have completed 83 million questions on Pandai, and 92% of users have seen some improvement in their academic performance. 

We plan to expand to Southeast Asia and other emerging markets, a market of 100M+ school students. Pandai is designed to be scalable, and our content (also available in English) can be mapped to other curricula from other countries.

short_description: Digital lending platform for Brazilian farmers
full_location: São Paulo, State of São Paulo, Brazil
description: Verde is a digital platform that simplifies and expands access to loans for small and medium farmers in Brazil. We serve farmers locally with faster and more transparent financial resources.

short_description: Bloomberg for cryptocurrencies
description: Coinfeeds is an API that provides real-time news and social sentiment on any cryptocurrency. We provide the best data by applying the same machine learning technologies we used when leading the data teams at Uber and Robinhood. Our long term vision is to become the Bloomberg for crypto.

short_description: Passwordless application management platform.
description:
idemeum is a Passwordless Application Management platform. Our vision is to provide a single place for small and medium businesses (SMBs) to set up and manage employee access to SaaS apps.

Behind the scenes we connect to any HR system and automate employee onboarding and account provisioning. Employees leverage mobile device biometrics to access any type of app - free or paid. 

Instead of deploying multiple tools for SSO, password management, and passwordless access, idemeum offers one platform to do it all.

short_description: Telehealth hub for pregnant people 🧡
description:
Ruth Health treats the 83% of post-pregnancy womxn who pee in their pants. We deliver 30-minute Postpartum Recovery + Training Sessions via telehealth, so moms around the globe with pelvic floor prolapse can get back to work, sex, and normal life—5x faster.

Using conversational AI + biometric readings, Ruth Health will accumulate the largest, most diverse database in America on longitudinal maternal health

short_description: A shared canvas for work.
description: Teamspace is a shared canvas for remote collaboration. It combines documents, images, tables, tasks and more on a realtime spatial canvas. It's designed for remote and video-first from the ground up.

short_description: Smart micro financing for everyone
description: Building the first digital bank for the economically vulnerable starting with a mobile lending app  for Mexico

short_description: Online cohort based courses in design and architecture
description:
Oneistox offers online cohort-based courses for designers, architects, and engineers from around the world for their professional growth. Learners are upskilling in subjects like Product design, Building Information design, Sustainable design, Computational design, Graphic design among others. 

Project-based learning and peer-to-peer interaction in cohort makes learning enriching and increases the completion rates to 82%. Learners work in groups of 2-6 on live projects and create significant outputs from scratch.

2000+ learners from 27 countries have already upskilled on Oneistox. The majority from India, Middle East and USA. 
Active community of 60,000 on social media.

The company is led by alumni of SPA Delhi and IIT Madras.

short_description: Reducing energy costs & emissions in buildings.
description:
Kapacity.io is building the future of smart energy grids with an electricity Load Balancing service focused on buildings.

By shifting electricity consumption in buildings to periods of lower electricity prices and higher renewable energy production, our customers pay less for electricity and emit less CO2. Our service can also participate in power grid balancing to help keep our lights on during moments of high energy demand.

Our customers are building owners, asset managers and energy companies who use Kapacity.io to reduce energy costs & emissions in their building portfolios. Buildings are responsible for 30% of global CO2-emissions. Our mission is to push that down to zero.

short_description: Plug is an API to accept payments with multiple payment providers
full_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
description: Plug gives digital businesses access to multiple payments services through a single integration, and the ability to change between them on a transaction to transaction basis without writing code.

short_description: Transforming pharmacies in the UK into diagnostic centers
description:
Tuli health is turning all 11 000 independent pharmacies in the UK into diagnostic centers.  Our software makes it easy for these pharmacies to sell and fulfill COVID-19 tests today and other diagnostic tests tomorrow. Instead of waiting for a long time or travelling a long distance to receive the tests, customers can now receive tests in their neighbourhood, with results guaranteed in 24 hours. 

Tuli Health was launched in June, had onboarded 147 pharmacies, performed over 7000 diagnostic tests, and helped pharmacies generate $1.3 million in incremental revenue per month. 

The vision is to make every local pharmacy into a diagnostic center powered by Tuli Health.

short_description: Valet Self Storage - Flexible, Full-Service Storage Spaces for INDIA
description:
Valet self-storage solution for your personal storage needs. Be it household storage or seasonal belongings, we will pick them up and store them in our facility. You get it back when you need it. 

Service built on technology and strong customer experience fundamentals.

short_description: We help students in Latin America graduate from College.
description: With online courses, we help students graduate from University, starting from the admissions and throughout their entire college education until they graduate. All our courses include 24/7 interaction with our Tutors and Teachers making 95% of our users reach their desire score. We have prepared more than 10,000 students and in 2021 we have already made 800K which means 6X Year-over-Year growth.

short_description: Patent-pending enzymes to break down common dietary triggers
description: Kiwi Biosciences can help 18M Americans suffering from Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS) enjoy a normal meal without running to the bathroom two hours later. We develop novel, patent-pending enzymes that break down common digestive triggers in food.

short_description: A marketplace for vinyl, cassettes and cds
description:
Nasdisc is a marketplace for the $4B worth of records purchased every year.

The vinyl market has seen exponential growth in the past decade - the first 6 months of this year has already seen an increase of 108% in sales. Our platform takes a 12% cut, making this a $400mm opportunity that is more than doubling every year.

Pressing plants are backed up years out, bots buy limited releases in seconds, and record prices are skyrocketing in both retail and aftermarket sales. Despite this growth, the only dedicated marketplace is difficult to use, doesn’t process transactions, yet facilitates over $600mm in vinyl exchanges per year. 

This is why I finally decided to quit my job at Google and recruit my best friends from college to fix it. We’re all software engineers and have been passionate about music and vinyl since we were kids, and have $50k in records ourselves.

We started building a marketplace in July and launched our website 4 weeks ago. We now have $1k / week in sales, and $50k in listings.

short_description: Online broker for high yield  savings accounts in Latin America
description: Luable allows people in Latin America to compare and invest in 5% yield savings accounts online. Unlike the US, you cannot sign up for a savings account online in LatAm unless you are already a customer. We make it easier for anyone to do it online.

short_description: Semi-Autonomous Diagnostics for Emergent Care
description: Caire Health's AI software reports imaging diagnostics directly to EMR and PACS applications to enable immediate delivery of life-saving treatment for emergencies and faster discharge for healthy patients. We empower critical care teams to take immediate action by improving clinician diagnostic accuracy to radiologist levels - ensuring that no emergency has to wait.

short_description: Radically better code-search
description: Nobody studies CS to spend their careers CTRL-F'ing their way through documentation and Stack Overflow. We surface code examples within the IDE, keeping developers in-flow.

short_description: Second brain for knowledge workers
description:
We are building a second brain for knowledge workers. Our app captures all the relevant information you consume - text, audio, video and summarizes it 1-click. It also makes it easy to search and retrieve the information you want, wherever you like.

All co-founders know each other since 2019 and met at a one-year AI fellowship. Since their time at the fellowship, they have felt frustrated creating their second brain while shifting between apps like Roam Research, and Obsidian. These applications were burdening them to do all three tasks of capturing, organizing, and retrieving, making the cost to value ratio of setting up the second brain really high. They decided to solve this and want to shift the burden of these steps on to software, making it easier for a user to build their second brain. 

Synth is targeting 30 million knowledge workers, who earn more than $100k, paying us $20 per month, presenting a $7.2billion market opportunity.

short_description: Infrastructure management software for water & electricity companies
description:
Pylon provides water and electricity distribution companies, in emerging markets, with a platform for reducing their losses as well as opening new revenue streams. These losses are coming from leakages, consumption thefts, and uncollected bills, amongst others.
We have signed 11 utilities onto our platform across 2 countries and connected our systems to over 560k endpoints.
Today our average client has reduced their aggregate revenue losses by 45%
Expanding in Africa, LATAM, and SEA.

short_description: Turn your content into unique digital collectibles.
description: Dime lets creators turn their content into unique digital collectibles. Fans can buy items from their favorite artists, trade them on our marketplace, and display their collections on our site. Under the hood everything is secured using NFTs, but we take care of all of that. For creators it’s just like Patreon--except fans get to own a unique digital item in exchange for their support.

short_description: Fastest way to purchase cyber insurance for small businesses
description: Telivy’s empowers SAAS platforms and insurance agencies with an embedded multi-carrier cyber insurance solution, providing the fastest and easiest solution to get cyber insurance for their small business customers. We are licensed to do business in 48 US states.

short_description: We help businesses convert leads into sales in minutes using text
Stripe for former Soviet Union countries
description: Innovator of online transactions, helping businesses in former soviet union countries to accept payments from around the world through a single integration.

short_description: A platform to make artificial viruses as cancer therapeutics.
description: Humane Genomics is an artificial virus platform. We design and build oncolytic therapeutics with unprecedented selectivity and efficiency. Our first indications are bone cancer, liver cancer and small cell lung cancer.
